1b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya/ bam po dang pol//
1b2('bum): dum bu bcu gcig pa// / rab 'byor nga gzhan
1b3('bum): yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gi mthar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zas
1b4('bum): kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol
1b5('bum): tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe// nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongasapar 'gyur/
1b6('bum): sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang / gang zag
1b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gi mthar bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa thos kyang
1b8('bum): yongs su ma 'dres/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstan
2a1('bum): pa'i chanem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga gzhan pa gang zag byang chub
2a2('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis/ sngon gyi mthar batshon 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
2a3('bum): phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de gzhan yang kang
2a4('bum): zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi maHra bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa thos kyang / yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes
2a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di/ bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan
2a6('bum): du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa thos kyang / yongs su ma dris yongs su
2a7('bum): brtag par ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ seMs
2a8('bum): kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis/ sngon ki mthar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa thos kyang yongs su ma
2b1('bum): dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa deni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la pa mo 'di bsta dad pa'i tshe nem nur du 'gyur/ mongs par 'gyur/ sems zhus par
2b2('bum): 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar nang stong pa nyid thos kyang / yongs su ma dris
2b3('bum): yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur
2b4('bum): sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa kang gi sa sngon gyi mthar phyi stong pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris
2b5('bum): yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha ro/ lad tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshenem du ra du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ seMs zhum par 'gyur/ sems
2b6('bum): kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa kang gis sngon gyi mthar phyi nang stong pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas
2b7('bum): pa de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i rem nur du 'gyur/ mongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzham
2b8('bum): 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gyis sngon gyi mthar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid thos nas kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa
3a1('bum): de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshenem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems
3a2('bum): kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar chen po stong pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su
3a3('bum): brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi cha
3a4('bum): pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar don dam pa stong pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris
3a5('bum): yongs su btag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ ne ma nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ seMs
3a6('bum): zhus par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar 'dus byas stong pa nyid
3a7('bum): zos kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su btag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bsta dad pa'i tshe dem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur
3a8('bum): sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor dgazhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon kyi mthar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid thos
3b1('bum): kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/
3b2('bum): sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar mtha' las
3b3('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du
3b4('bum): 'gyurarmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// / rab 'byor dkazhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg
3b5('bum): pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
3b6('bum): zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da gzhan yang gang
3b7('bum): zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol
3b8('bum): tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
4a1('bum): gzhan yud byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar rang bzhin stong pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa
4a2('bum): de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ rem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan
4a3('bum): du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar chos thams cad stong pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris yongs
4a4('bum): su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur
4a5('bum): sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de gzhan yang gang zag bya nga chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar rang
4a6('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur
4a7('bum): rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi
4a8('bum): mthar myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid zos kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du
4b1('bum): 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis
4b2('bum): sngon gyi mthar dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem
4b3('bum): nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa kang
4b4('bum): gis sngon gyi mthar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zos kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/
4b5('bum): nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ se mas zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan dugyur ro// rab 'byor de gzhan yang gang zag byang
4b6('bum): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol
4b7('bum): tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i sa nem nur du 'gyur/ mongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga gzhan
4b8('bum): yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi thos kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab
5a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan
5a2('bum): du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar yang dag par spong ba bzhi thos kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su
5a3('bum): brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ ses
5a4('bum): kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon kyi mthar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi zos kyang yongs su ma dris
5a5('bum): yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi/ pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ na/ ma nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems
5a6('bum): zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa kazhar du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da gzhan yang gang zag byung chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mapar dbang po lnga pos kyang yongs
5a7('bum): sum dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ ses
5a8('bum): zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar stobs lnga zos kyang
5b1('bum): yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur
5b2('bum): sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mabar byang chub kyi
5b3('bum): yan lag bdun thos kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ ner nur du 'gyur/ mongs
5b4('bum): par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sem sa kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor dga' na yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis
5b5('bum): sngon gyi mthar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di
5b6('bum): bsand pa'i dem chungs 'gyur/ mongs par gyur/ sems zhus pa 'gyurasems kyi rnam pa gzhas du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag bya
5b7('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi thos kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
5b8('bum): zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshenem nur du 'gyur/ mongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da gzhan yang kapa/
6a1('bum): zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar bsam gtan bzhi thos kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha
6a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bsta dad pa'iHdem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
6a3('bum): gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis/ sngon gyi mthar tshad myed pa bzhi thos kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha
6a4('bum): rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem rung du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro//
6a5('bum): rab 'byor de gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs
6a6('bum): su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/
6a7('bum): sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis/ sngon gyi mthar rnam par tha rad pa brgyad zos kyang yongs su
6a8('bum): ma drisayongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems
6b1('bum): zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar mthard kyis gnas pa'i
6b2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thos kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ rem nur dul
6b3('bum): 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang
6b4('bum): gis sngon gyi mthar rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa thos kyang yodas su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni
6b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan
6b6('bum): du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar mngon par shes pa lnga thos kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su
6b7('bum): brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/
6b8('bum): sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar ting nge 'dzind rnams zos kyang yongs
7a1('bum): su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem rurang du 'gyur/ rmongs par
7a2('bum): 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar
7a3('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams thos kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/
7a4('bum): rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor/ da gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa
7a5('bum): gang gis sngon gyi mthar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu thos kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
7a6('bum): zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da gzhan yang
7a7('bum): gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis/ sngon gyi mthar myi 'jigs pa bzhi thos kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol
7a8('bum): tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem rur du 'gyur/ mongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab
7b1('bum): 'byor nga gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngor gyi mthar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thos kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su btag pa ma byas
7b2('bum): pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'idem rung du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa
7b3('bum): gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar byams pa chen po zos kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su
7b4('bum): brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshenem num du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par
7b5('bum): 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i bla ga pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar snying rje chen po thos kyang
7b6('bum): yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshenes num du 'gyur/ mongs par 'gyur/
7b7('bum): sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar sangs rgyas kyi chos
7b8('bum): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thos kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/
8a1('bum): rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang
8a2('bum): kis sngon gyi mthar thams cad shes pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem
8a3('bum): rur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa
8a4('bum): gang gis sngon gyi mthar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid thos/ kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo
8a5('bum): 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem rurang du 'gyur/ rmo sa par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de gzhan ya
8a6('bum): gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thos kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni
8a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi dad pa zab mo 'di bas dad pa'i tshe rem chur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro//
8a8('bum): rab 'byor de gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di zos nas yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag
8b1('bum): pa ma byas te/ nyi ma gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum 'am/ bzhi 'am/ lngar rjes su ma 'brangs na gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol
8b2('bum): tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing rtog pa dang / nyi ma gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum 'am/ bzhi 'am/ lngar rjes su 'brang bar byed pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
8b3('bum): pa zab mo 'di myi 'phrogs par myi 'gyur te/ yongs su dri ba dang yang myi ldan par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da de ni de ltar yang 'gyur te/ gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol
8b4('bum): tu phyind pa zab mo 'di yongs su ma dris yongs su ma brtags rjes su 'brang ba ma byas pa de ni sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di mnyan pa la de tsam
8b5('bum): gyi dge ba'i bsam pa dang / mos pa skye bar 'gyur te/ de ni bar bar mos shing bar bar mos pa myed par 'gyur te/ de ni ldam ldem gyi blo ngas 'phrogs shing / shing bal gyi
8b6('bum): gzegs ma bzhin du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ni/ yun ring po nas theg pa la zhugs pa ma yin par rig par bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes
8b7('bum): gnyen gyis yongs su ma bzung ba'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur ma byas pa'o// rab 'byor dkang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa des ni
8b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di'i lung ma mnos kha ton tu ma byas la/ tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas te/ des ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la ma bslabs so//
9a1('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la ma bslabs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyind pa la ma bslabs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la ma bslabs so/
9a2('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la ma bslabs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la ma bslabs so// rang stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// phyi stong pa nyid la ma bsrabs so//
9a3('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// chen po stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// 'dus
9a4('bum): byas stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// 'dus ma bya/ des stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// mtha' las 'dadas pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// thog ma dang
9a5('bum): tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// rang bzhi na stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// chos thams
9a6('bum): cad stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid las
9a7('bum): bslabs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la ma bslabs so//
9a8('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams la ma bslabs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la ma bslabs so// dbang po rnams la ma bslabs so// stobs rnams la ma bslabs so//
9b1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la ma bslabs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la ma bslabs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la ma bslabs so// bsam gtan rnams
9b2('bum): la ma bsrabs so// chang myed pa rnams la ma bslabs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la ma bslabs so// rnam par tha ra pa brgyad la ma bslabs so//
9b3('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la ma bslabs so// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la ma bslabs so/
9b4('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams la ma bslabs so// ting nge 'dzind rnams la ma bslabs so// gzungs kyi sgo rnam sa la ma bslabs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
9b5('bum): bcu la ma bslabs so// myi 'jigs pa bzhi la ma bslabs so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la ma bslabs so// byams pa chen po la ma bslabs so//
9b6('bum): snying rje chen po la ma bslabs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la ma bslabs so// rgyun drang zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la ma bsrabs so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
9b7('bum): bu la ma bslabs so// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la ma bslabs so// dgra bcom pa nyid la ma bslabs so// rang byang chub la ma bslabs so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la sa
9b8('bum): bslabs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la ma bslabs so// rab 'byor da gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs par rig par bya ste/
10a1('bum): de ni dad partsa dang / dga' ba tsam dang / mos pa tsam dang ldan par zad de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bri ba 'am klag pa 'am/ lung 'bog
10a2('bum): pa 'am/ kha ton bya ba 'am/ tshul bzhin du yid la bya bar myi nus so// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu
10a3('bum): tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di myi 'dri zhing / lung myi 'bog pa dang / kha ton myi byed cing / tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'dis gzhan la phan myi
10a4('bum): 'dogs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyi nad pas gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pas gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang /
10a5('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pas gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du
10a6('bum): phyi nad pas gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang // nang stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / phyi nang stong pa
10a7('bum): nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / don dam
10a8('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa
10b1('bum): ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phar myi 'dogs pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong
10b2('bum): pa nyid kyis gzhan la par myi 'dogs pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la par myi 'dogs pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phar myi 'dogs pa dang /
10b3('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la
10b4('bum): phar myi 'dogs pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs
10b5('bum): pa dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis gzha nal phan myi 'dogs pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang
10b6('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / dbang po rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / stobs rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang
10b7('bum): byang chub kyi yan+da la gu rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis
10b8('bum): gzhan la pharan myi 'dogs pa dang / bsam gtan rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / chad myed pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan gyi 'dogs pa dang / gzugs myed
11a1('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i
11a2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgus gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pas gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa
11a3('bum): dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi
11a4('bum): 'dogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / myi 'jig/ sa pa bzhis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang
11a5('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis gzhan la phan myi 'dog sa pa dang / byams pa chen pos gzhan la phan myi 'a dogs pa dang / snying rje chen pos gzhan la phan myi
11a6('bum): 'dogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus gzhan la phani mya 'dogs pa dang / lan
11a7('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa
11a8('bum): dang / rang byang chub kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyis gzhan la
11b1('bum): par gyi 'dogs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa dang mthun par gyi spyod bsam gtan gyi pha rol dudu phyind pa dang mthun par gyi spyod brtsod 'grus kyi pha mo
11b2('bum): tu phyi dad pa dang mthun par myi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyi rad pa dang mthun par myi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang mthun par myi spyod sbyin pa'i pha
11b3('bum): rolang du byind pa dang mthun par gyi spyod drang song ba nyid dang mthun par myi spyod byi stong pa nyid dang mthun bar myi spyod phyi nang stong pa nyid dang mthur bar gyi spyod
11b4('bum): stong ba nyid stong pa nyid dang mthun par gyi myong mtho stong ba nyid dang mthun par gyi spyod don dam pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod 'dus byas
11b5('bum): stong pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod 'dus byas spo pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod thog ma dang
11b6('bum): ba ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang mthur par myi spyod dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid
11b7('bum): dang mthun par gyi spyod rang gi mtshan nyid stong ba nyid dang mthur bar myi spyod/ myi daphyogs pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par gyi spyod dngos po byed pa stong ba nyid dang mthur pa
11b8('bum): gyi spong ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid dang mthur bar gyi spyod dngos po byed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang mthur bar myi spyod/ drang ba nye bar gzhag pa rnams dpam bur par gyi
12a1('bum): sbyor yang dag par spong ba rnams dang mthur bar myi spyod rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang mthun par myi spyodar dbang po rnams dang mthun par myi spyod
12a2('bum): stobs rnams dang mthun par myi spyod byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang mthun par myi spyod 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang mthun par myi spyod 'phags pa'i
12a3('bum): bden pa rnams dang mthun par myi spyod bsam gtan rnams dang mthun par myi spyod/ tshad myed pa rnams dang mthun par myi spyod gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
12a4('bum): rnams dang mthun par myi spyod/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang 'thun par myi spyod/ mthar kyis gnas pa 'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang mthun par myi spyod
12a5('bum): rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan mamyed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang mthun par myi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang mthun par myi spyod/ ting
12a6('bum): nge 'dzind rnams dang mthun par myi spyod gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang mthun par myi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mthun par myi spyod myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang mthun
12a7('bum): bar myi spyod so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang mthun par myi spyod snying rje chen po dang mthun par myi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang mthun par myi spyod
12a8('bum): rgyu nang du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang 'thun par myi spyod/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang mthun par myi spyod phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'thun bar myi spyod dgra bcom pa nyid
12b1('bum): ma spong sa da pa bshes pa nyid dang 'thun par rtsod/ rnam pa mams padas khyen pa nyid dang du pa kyi sto nga/
12b2('bum): xxx
12b3('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo da dag gis thod gyi sa ba sang shes rab kyi ma roso du byin palab mo 'dis bris sa bas du 'aton dum byas tshul bzhin du med sa
12b4('bum): byas la shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa 'dis kyang / pa rol la ba nas btags byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis
12b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa 'di dang 'thun par ma spyad pa de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ngas gnas gnyis dang /
12b6('bum): sa gnyis po de las gcig la gnas par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o//
12b7('bum): dam/ gas rab kyis rol sbyin pa stong zag 'argyal lasasems su ro// rang 'byor sa
12b8('bum): rgya mtsho'i dbus su mu zhig la myi rnams shing ngam shing dum 'am/ shing le ba 'am/ rgyal pa 'am/ rol myi 'ju myi 'dzind na rab 'byor da myi de dag ni rgya mtsho chen po'i/
13a1('bum): pha rol kyi 'gram du ma phyi nad par dus byed par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor da myi gang rgya mtsho'i dbus su gru zhig pa'i tshe/ shing ngam/ shing du ma 'am/ shing
13a2('bum): leb 'am rgya lang pa 'am rol 'ju zhing 'dzind pa de dag ni rgya mtshor dus byed par myi 'gyur te/ bde zhing nyam/ nyes myed par rgya mtsho chen po nas pha rol kyi 'gram du
13a3('bum): phyind par 'gyur te/ mnyes ma nyams par zang la phyind par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dad pa tsam
13a4('bum): dga' ba tsam dang / mos pa tsam dang / ldan pa gang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di myi 'dri/ myi ston kha ton tu myi byed tshul bzhin du yid
13a5('bum): la myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa myi 'dri myi ston kha ton tu myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing / myi rten
13a6('bum): pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi 'dri/ myi ston kha ton tu myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing / myi rtend pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa
13a7('bum): myi 'dri myi ston kha ton tu myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing / myi rtend pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi 'dri myi ston pa kha ton tu myi byed
13a8('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing / myi rtend pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi 'dri/ myi ston kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rte nad pa dang /
13b1('bum): ra stong pa nyid mi 'dri kyi stonang kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi chend pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'dri myi ston pa/ kha ton tu myi byed
13b2('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing / myi rtend pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'dri/ kyi ston du/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing / myi rte nad pa dang /
13b3('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'dri myi ston du kha ton tu myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi ston
13b4('bum): kha ton tu myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid myi 'dri// myi ston kha ton tu myi byedatshul bzhin du
13b5('bum): yid la myi byed cing / myi rte nang pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi storang kha ton tu myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing / myi
13b6('bum): tshe dang pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi stonang/ kha ton tu myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing / myi rtenang pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong
13b7('bum): pa nyid myi 'dri myi ston pa/ kha ton tu myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing / myi rtend pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi ston
13b8('bum): kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing / myi rte nad pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi stonang kha ton tu myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yang la
14a1('bum): myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi 'dri/ myi ston kha ton tu myi byedatshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing / myi rte nad pa dang /
14a2('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi 'dre myi ston kha ton tu myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing / myi rtend pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi 'dri/ myi
14a3('bum): ston kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing / myi rtend pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi 'dri/ myi ston kha ton tu myi byed tshul bzhin
14a4('bum): du yid la myi byed cing / myi rtend pa dang / dngosapo myed pa stong pa nyid myi 'dri/ myi ston/ kha to nang / tu myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten
14a5('bum): pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi 'dri/ myi ston kha ton tu myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing / myi rtend pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
14a6('bum): kyi 'dri myi stonang / kha ton tu myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rte nad pa dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'dri / myi stonang / kha ton tu
14a7('bum): myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing / myi che nad pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams myi 'dri/ myi spyonang / kha ton tu myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing
14a8('bum): myi rtend pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myi 'dri / myi ston kha ton tu myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing / myi rtend pa dang / dbang po rnams myi 'dri
14b1('bum): myi ston pa kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing / myi rtend pa dang / stobs rnams myi 'dri/ myi ston pa/ kha ton tu myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing
14b2('bum): kyi te nad pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myi 'dri gyi stonang/ kha ton tu myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing / myi te nad pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
14b3('bum): brkyang pa myi 'dri myi ston kha ton tu myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'dri/ myi ston / kha ton tu myi byed
14b4('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing / myi rte nang pa dang / bsam gtan rnams myi 'dri myi ston kha ton du myi byedatshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing / myi rten pa dang
14b5('bum): tshad myed pa rnams myi 'dri / myi ston pa kha ton tu myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing / myi rten pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
14b6('bum): myi 'dri myi ston kha ton tu myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing / myi rtend pa dang / rnam par thard pa rnams myi 'dri / myi ston kha ton du myi byed/
14b7('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing / myi rtend pa dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu myi 'dri/ myi ston / kha ton tu myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la
14b8('bum): myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang / rnam par b.rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa mye 'dri kyi ston kha ton tu myi byed/ tshul bzhin
15a1('bum): du yid la myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'dri/ myi stond/ kha ton tu myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing / myi rtend pa/
15a2('bum): dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams myi 'dri/ myi stond kha ton tu myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing / myi rtend pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi 'dri/ myi ston
15a3('bum): kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing / myi rtend pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu myi 'dri/ myi ston pa/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du
15a4('bum): yid la myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang / myi 'jigs pa ba zhi myi 'dri/ myi ston / kha ton tu myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing / myi rte nad pa dang /
15a5('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi myi 'dri/ myi ston / kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing / myi rtend pa dang / byams pa chen po myi 'dri /
15a6('bum): ston kha ton tu myi byed tshul bzhin du yid myi byed cing / myi rtend pa dang / snying rje chen po myi 'dri/ myi ston kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed
15a7('bum): cing myi rtend pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad myi 'dre/ myi ston/ kha ton tu myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing / myi rtend pa dang / zas
15a8('bum): cad shes pa nyid myi 'dri myi ston / kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing / myi rtend pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myi 'dri/ myi stonang/
15b1('bum): don du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing/ myi rtend pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi 'dri kyi ston / kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la
15b2('bum): myi byed ci rtsini nang pa de dag ni ba ma dor byang chub las nyams par 'gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma thob par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
15b3('bum): kyis mngon tu byed par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa' gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
15b4('bum): ba'i don du dad pa yod cing bzod pa dang / sa pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / dka' da spro ba dang / kyi gtong ba yod cing brtson
15b5('bum): 'grus kyi 'dor ba de dag ri shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin du pa zud mo 'di 'dri'o/ lung 'bog go// kha ton tu byed do// tshul bzhin du yid la byed do//
15b6('bum): te rang par byed do// de ltar na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ tshogs kyi bu mo de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dad pa sod de/ bzod pa yod/ mos pa yod
15b7('bum): lhag pa'i bsam pa yod/ dga' ba yod/ spro ba yod/ myi gtong ba yod/ brtson 'grus myi 'dor ba yod pa yin te/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs
15b8('bum): su bzung ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyidad pas yongs su bzung ba dang / brtsom 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang
16a1('bum): pas yongs su bzung ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyind pas yongs su bzung ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pas yongs su bzung ba dang /
16a2('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
16a3('bum): bzung ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang
16a4('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba da / pa/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs
16a5('bum): su bzung ba dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis
16a6('bum): yongs su bzung ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
16a7('bum): bzung ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pas yongs su bzung ba
16a8('bum): dang / yang dag par spong bas yongs su bzung ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas yongs su bzung ba dang / dbang pos yongs su bzung ba dang / stobs kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
16b1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag gis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pas yongs su bzung ba dang / bsam gtan gyis
16b2('bum): yongs su bzung ba dang / tshad myed pas yongs su bzung ba dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam par thard pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
16b3('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / spond pa myed pas yongs su bzung ba dang /
16b4('bum): mngon par shes pas yongs su bzung ba dang / ting nge 'ji nad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / gzungs kyi sgos yod das su bzung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
16b5('bum): bcus yongs su bzung ba dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhis so ngas su bzung ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / byams pa chen pos yongs
16b6('bum): su bzung ba dang / snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba
16b7('bum): dang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ bar ma dor nye zho myed par nyan thos kyi sa las
16b8('bum): 'das rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te/ sems can yongs su sbyind par byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas te/ tha na myed pa yang dag par rdzog
17a1('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ bud myed dam/ skyes pa lnga la zhig bum pa ma bsregs shing som
17a2('bum): btang bas/ chu bcu par sems na rab 'byor dbum pa de ni ring por myi gnas te/ b+hu rang tu 'gyes shing 'jig par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni bus pa de so sa
17a3('bum): btang ba'i phyir te/ de ni tha maras nyid du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga de bzhin du skyems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
17a4('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir dang / pa yod yod/ bzod pa yang yod/ mos pa yang / yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/ dka'
17a5('bum): ba yang yod/ spro ba yang yod/ myi gtong ba yang brtson 'grus kyi 'dor ba yang yod mod kyi de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzung
17a6('bum): babs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzung brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzung / bzod pa ni
17a7('bum): pha rol du phyind pas yongs su ma bzung tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzung / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzung // nang stong
17a8('bum): pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
17b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung don dus pa song pa nyid kyis yongs sus bzung 'das rgyas song bya nyid rgyas yongs sus bzung / brgyas ma byas stong
17b2('bum): stongs sus slong pa nyid kyis ses sum 'duthogs dngug su myed pa song pa nyid kyis yongs pa ro brgyad pa
17b3('bum): nyid kyis yongs su su bad+ma rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs sus bzung chom gsal pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang gi margyas nyid stong pa nyid kyim
17b4('bum): sum bzung gyi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis sodasum bzung dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis ngas su ma bzung / ngobo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yong
17b5('bum): sum brdu chopa po byed pamingos nyid pa nyid kyis yongs su ma badran pa gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung
17b6('bum): xxx
17b7('bum): kyang chub kyi kyis songs sus bzungags pa'ims sadasag brgyad pas yongs susu bzang 'phags pa' bdes pa mas kyim
17b8('bum): pa bzung bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / chad gye pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzungagazugs byed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su sa bzung /
18a1('bum): rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su ma bzung / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
18a2('bum): dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pas yongs su ma bzung / mngon par shes pa lngas yongs su ma bzung / ting nge 'dzind rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzungs
18a3('bum): kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung / myi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs
18a4('bum): su ma bzung byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzungasnying rje chen pos yongs su ma bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung
18a5('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / ma gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / ma pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung na/
18a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bar ma dor nye zhor 'gyur bar shes par bya'o// /
18a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po gnyis / rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'om
18b1('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bar ma dor nye zho 'byung ba gang zhe na/ 'di sa ste/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o// rab 'byor du 'di lta ste dper nA/ skyes pa 'am
18b2('bum): bud myed la la zhig bum pa so legs par btang bas chu klung 'am/ mtsho 'am/ mche'u 'am/ khron pa nas chu chun rab 'byor nga chu chu ba de'i bum pa des ni ba de bar khyim du phyi nad par
18b3('bum): rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la/ za ra byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod/ bzod pa yang
18b4('bum): yod mos pa yang yod/ lhag bsrabasasadamang sod/ dgal bas yod/ spro ba yang yod myi gtong ba yang yod brtson 'grus kyi 'dor ba
18b5('bum): yod la/ de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pas yongs su bzung thabs mkhas pas yongs su ba zung / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyind pas yongs
18b6('bum): su bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pas yongs su bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung
18b7('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung // nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung
18b8('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su 'azung do dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs sul
19a1('bum): bzung / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
19a2('bum): bzung / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
19a3('bum): nyid kyis yongs su bzung / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung
19a4('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dran pa nye bar gzhag pas yongs su bzung / yang da dag par spong bas yongs su bzung / rdzu 'phrul gyi
19a5('bum): rkang pas yongs su bzung / dbang pos yongs su ba zung / stobs kyis yongs su bzung / byang chub kyi yan lag gis yongs su bzung / 'phags
19a6('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pas yongs su bzung / bsam gtan gyis yongs su bzung / tshad myed pas yongs su bzung /
19a7('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas yongs su bzung / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung /
19a8('bum): rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pas yongs su bzung / mngon par shes pas yongs su bzung / ting nge 'dzind kyis yongs
19b1('bum): su bzung / gzungs kyi sgos yongs su bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung / myi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung / so so yang dag par
19b2('bum): rig pa bzhis yongs su bzung / byams pos yongs su bzung / snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su bzung
19b3('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung na// ra
19b4('bum): 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rangs sa rgyas kyi sar bar ma dor nye zhor myi 'gyur te/
19b5('bum): ma nyes ma nyams par bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho'i gru ma
19b6('bum): bsdams shing zag klan ma byas par rdzas bcug ste tshu la btang na/ rab 'byor dgu de ni zhig par 'gyur te/ gru yang log shig rdzas kyang / log shig tu song nas de ltar
19b7('bum): tshong ba de thabs myi mkhas pas/ gnod pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur zhing rin po che chen po las yongs su pang par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems
19b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod/ bzod pa yang yod/ mos pa yang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod
20a1('bum): dga' ba yang yod/ spro ba yang yod/ myi gtong ba yang yod/ brtson 'grus myi 'dor ba yang yod mod kyi de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su ma
20a2('bum): bzung / thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyind pas yongs su ma bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pas yongs su ma bzung
20a3('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pas yongs su ma bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pas yongs su ma bzung / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pas yongs su ma bzung // nang
20a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi stong pa nyidakyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yod sa su bzung/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs
20a5('bum): su ma bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma ba zung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung
20a6('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung
20a7('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid
20a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis sngos
20b1('bum): su ma bzung / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis
20b2('bum): yongs su ma bzung / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / dbang po rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / stobs rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / byang chub kyi
20b3('bum): yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su ma bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / bsam
20b4('bum): gtan rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / chang myed pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung
20b5('bum): rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dkyus yo sa su ma bzung / rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo spong
20b6('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / sbrond pa myed pas yongasu ma bzung / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / ting nge 'dzind rnams kyis yongs su ma
20b7('bum): bzung / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung / myi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung
20b8('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung / byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzung / snying rje chen pos yongs su ma bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
21a1('bum): 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung
21a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung na// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bar ma dor nye zhor 'gyur te/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyend
21a3('bum): pa nyid rin po che'i don chen po dang bral zhing rin po che chen po las yang bar rig par bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bar ma do'i nyi zho gang zhe na/
21a4('bum): 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyanas kyi sa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can la la zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i
21a5('bum): gru shi nang tu bsdams shing / shi nad tu bsta rang ba chu la gtong zhing rdzas 'jug na/ rab 'byor nga rgya mtsho'i glu de ni bar ma dor zhig par myi 'gyur te/ bru des phyog
21a6('bum): gang du bgrod pa der phyi nad par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi
21a7('bum): phyir dad pa yang yod/ bzod pa yang yod/ mos pa yang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/ dga' ba yang yod/ spro ba yang yod/ myi gtong ba yang yod
21a8('bum): brtson 'grus myi 'dor ba yang yod la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyi nad pas
21b1('bum): yongs su bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung
21b2('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyind pas yongs su bzung / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / sgo
21b3('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung
21b4('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / mthada' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung
21b5('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / chos tham/ sa cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / rang ka la
21b6('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs
21b7('bum): su 'azung / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung // rlan pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs sul
21b8('bum): bzung / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / dbang po rnams kyis yongs su bzung / stobs rnams kyis yongs su bzung / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
22a1('bum): kyis yongs su bzung 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / bsam
22a2('bum): gtan rnams kyis yongasu bzung tshad myed pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / rnam par tha rad pa
22a3('bum): brgyad kyis yongs su bzung mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /
22a4('bum): smond pa myed pas yongs su bzung mngon par sa pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / ting nge 'dzind rnams kyis yongs su bzungagazungs kyi sgo
22a5('bum): rnams kyis yongs su bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'istobs bcus yongs su bzung / myi 'jigs pa bzhi sa yongs su bzung so so yang dag par rig pa
22a6('bum): bzhis yongs su bzung byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung / snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su bzung
22a7('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung na// rab 'byor/
22a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bar ma dor nye zhor myi 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// rab 'byor da de ni de ltar yang
22b1('bum): 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gangs bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod/ bzod pa yang yod/ mos pa yang
22b2('bum): yod lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/ dga' ba yang yod/ spro ba yang yod/ myi gtong ba yang yod/ brtson 'grus myi 'dor ba yang yod la de yang shes rab
22b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su zin par gyurd/ zabs mkhas pas yongs su zind par gyur/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su zind par gyurapa/ brtson
22b4('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su zin par gyur/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su zin par gyurapa/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pas
22b5('bum): yongs su zin par gyurapa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pas yongs su zin par gyur nga // nang s+ho/ nga pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyurd phyi
22b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur da/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur / chen po stong pa nyid
22b7('bum): yongs su zin par gyurapa/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur pa/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyurapa/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
22b8('bum): kyis yongs su zin par gyur mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur pa/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyurapa
23a1('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zind par gyur/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
23a2('bum): zin par gyurapa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyurapa/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur pa/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis smos
23a3('bum): su zin par gyur pa/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur pa/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur da// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnas
23a4('bum): kyis yongs su zin par gyur da/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur da/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur
23a5('bum): dbang po rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur pa/ sto bas rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur
23a6('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su zin par gyurapa/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyurapa/ bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur
23a7('bum): tshad myed pa rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyurapa/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur pa rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyis yongs su zin par
23a8('bum): gyurd mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su zin par gyurd rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang spon pa
23b1('bum): byed pas yongs su zin par gyur/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/ ting nge 'dzind rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis ltos
23b2('bum): su zin par gyur de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su zin par gyur/ myi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su zin par gyur/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su
23b3('bum): thon par gyur byams pa chen pos yongs su zin par gyur/ snying rje chen pos yongs su byin par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyis yongs su zin par gyur
23b4('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyurapa lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par
23b5('bum): gyur da na// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' na po de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mya ngo // rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na byin
23b6('bum): tshod kyis lo brgya nyi mu lon pargas pa dgog tu gyur du ba 'khogs pa zhig yod la de'i yum la rlung ngam/ mchis pa 'am/ bad kan nam/ 'dus pa'i nad kyis btab sa/
23b7('bum): 'byor de la 'i snyam du sems ga cig sa byas mas sa zhisas 'ang gso 'ang pa bcom ldan 'das na // ldan 'das de
23b8('bum): las ldang dus su lags kyang / rgyang grags gcig gam/ rgyang grags gnyis su yang mchi bar gyi rus te/ de rgas pa dang / zo 'cham pas nyam dmas pa'i slad du khrims
24a1('bum): ljang rus su lags kyang mchi myi nus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la
24a2('bum): na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod/ bzod pa yang yod/ mos pa yang yod lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/ dga' ba yang yod/
24a3('bum): ba yang yod myi gtong ba yang yod/ brtson 'grus myi 'dor ba yang yod mod kyi/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzungathabs mkhas pas
24a4('bum): yongs su ma bzung bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzung / brtson 'grus/ kyi pha rol du phyi nad pas yongs su ma bzung
24a5('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzung / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzung /
24a6('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma
24a7('bum): bzung chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus ma
24a8('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dor ba
24b1('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
24b2('bum): kyis yongs su ma bzung / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma
24b3('bum): bzung dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs
24b4('bum): su ma bzung rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yod sa su ma bzung / dbang po rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung/ stobs rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung
24b5('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su ma bzu pa 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su
24b6('bum): ma bzung bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / tshad myed pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung
24b7('bum): rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzungamathard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su ma bzung / rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
24b8('bum): ma myed pa dngasmon pa myed pas yongs su ma bzung mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ting nge 'dzind rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzungs kyi
25a1('bum): sgo rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su ma bzung / myi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung / so so yang dag
25a2('bum): par rig pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung / byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzung / snying rje chen pos yongs su ma bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su
25a3('bum): ma bzung thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung na// /
25a4('bum): rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po da ni bar ma dor nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sar sa rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na
25a5('bum): de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzla nga ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyi nad pas yongs su
25a6('bum): ma bzung ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang
25a7('bum): pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyind pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma
25a8('bum): ma bzung ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung ba dang /
25b1('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / mtha
25b2('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /
25b3('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / phyi rgyag
25b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang /
25b5('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bcu ra ba dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yo sa su ma bzung ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams
25b6('bum): kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / dbang po rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / stobs rnams kyis yongs su ma
25b7('bum): sa bzung ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa
25b8('bum): rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / tshad myed pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
26a1('bum): par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
26a2('bum): dgus yongs su ma bzung ba dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams
26a3('bum): kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus
26a4('bum): yongs su ma bzung ba dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhis yod sa su ma bzung ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi das yongs su ma bzung ba dang / byams pa chen pos
26a5('bum): yongs su ma bzung ba dang / snying rje chen pos yongs su ma bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / thams cad
26a6('bum): shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba'i phyir ro//
26a7('bum): rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ dper na myi na chod kyis lo brgya nyi shu lon pa rgas pa/ dgog tu gyur pa/ 'khogs pa de nyid rlung ngam/ mkhris pa 'am/ bad kar nam
26a8('bum): 'dus pa'i nad kyis btab par gyur la/ de khri las ldang bar 'dod na de la skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa/ gnyis kyis glo g.yas g.yos nas bzung ste/ brten nas 'di
26b1('bum): skad du kye skyes bu khyod ci dka' ba'i don tu gar 'dod par 'dong ngo // khyod ni bdag cag gis bzung gis gnas der ma byi nad kyi bar du lam rku bar ma dor rdeg 'chal pas 'jigs par
26b2('bum): myi 'gyur ro// zhes bsgo ba de bzhin du rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod
26b3('bum): bzod pa yang yod mos pa yang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/ dga' ba yang yod/ spro ba yang yod/ myi gtong ba yang yod/ brtson 'grus myi 'dor ba
26b4('bum): yang yod de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs/ su bzung / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung /
26b5('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pas yongs su bzung bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung la khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung
26b6('bum): sbyin pa'i pha 'o mo tu phyi dad pas yongs su bzung / da thongs nyid kyis yongs su brdung / stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung byi da bstong pa nyid kyis yongs su badz+ra
26b7('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / 'dus
26b8('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis
27a1('bum): yongs su bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung
27a2('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis
27a3('bum): yongs su bzung // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su bzung / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / dbang po
27a4('bum): rnams kyis yongs su bzung / stobs rnams kyis yo ngas su bzung / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su bzung / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas
27a5('bum): yongs su bzung 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su bzung / tshad myed pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung
27a6('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / rnam par ba rad pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung
27a7('bum): rnam par b.rang bar sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma byed pa dang / smond pa myed pas yongs su bzung / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / ting nge 'din rnams kyis yongs su
27a8('bum): bzung / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung / kyi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su 'azung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis
27b1('bum): yongs su bzung byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung / snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid
27b2('bum): kyis yongs su bzung lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung na// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
27b3('bum): chen po de ni bar ma dor nye zhor myi 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi gnas der phyi nad par nus so//
27b4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral ba'i phyir ro// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ gang zag
27b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin da pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ba lags
27b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa rab 'byor khyod de ltar gang bag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyi don du de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa legs so// legs
27b7('bum): so// rab 'byor nga 'di la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thog mar sbyin pa yongs su gtong na/ de bdag dang bdag gir ltung ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / tshul khris
27b8('bum): srung ba dang bzod pa sgom pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / shes rab sgom na/ de yang bdag dang bdag gir ltung ba'i sems kyis
28a1('bum): shes rab sgom ste/ de sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ 'di snyam du sems ste/ bdag ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / 'di la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o//
28a2('bum): bdag ni tshul khrims srung ngo // tshul khrims ni 'di srung ngo // bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o// bdag ni bzod pa sgom mo/ bzod pa ni 'di sgom mo/ bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o//
28a3('bum): bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ brtson 'grus ni 'di rtsom mo/ bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o// bdag ni bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug go/ bsam gtan ni 'di dag la
28a4('bum): snyoms par 'jug go/ bdag ni bsam gtan pa'o// bdag ni shes rab sgom mo// shes rab ni 'di sgom mo bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o snyam nas/ de sbyin pa
28a5('bum): rlom sems su byed/ sbyin pas rlom sems su byed bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de tshul khrims rlom sems su byed/ tshul khrims kyis
28a6('bum): rlom sems su byed bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de bzod pa rlom sems su byed/ bzod pas rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan
28a7('bum): ba'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de brtson 'grus rlom sems su byed/ brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed
28a8('bum): de bsam gtan rlom sems su byed/ bsam gtan rnams kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni bsam gtan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de shes rab rlom sems su byed
28b1('bum): shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyind pa la rtog pa de dag myed de/ ring
28b2('bum): du song ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rtog pa de dag myed de/ ring du song ba ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol
28b3('bum): tu phyind pa la rtog pa de dag myed de/ ring du song ba ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rtog pa de dag myed de/ ring du song ba ni brtson
28b4('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bsam gtan gyi rol tu phyind pa la rtog pa de dag myed de/ ring du so dang ba ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// shes
28b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rtog pa de dag myed de/ ngadu song ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nad pa'o// de lta yin yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa
28b6('bum): de ring du song ba yang myi shes pha rol yang myi shes te/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyi nad pas yongs su ma bzung / bzod pa'i
28b7('bum): pha rol du phyind pas yongs su ma bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyind pas yongs su ma bzung bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzung / shes rab
28b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzung // nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
29a1('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus byas stong
29a2('bum): pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis
29a3('bum): yongs su ma bzung / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung
29a4('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung
29a5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung/
29a6('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / dbang po rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / stobs rnams kyis yongs su
29a7('bum): ma bzung / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su ma bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su
29a8('bum): ma bzung bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / tshad myed pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma
29b1('bum): bzupa/ rnam par thard pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dkyus yongs su ma bzung / rnam par tha da pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
29b2('bum): dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / spo nad pa myed pas yongs su ma bzung / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / ting nge 'dzind rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung
29b3('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su ma bzung / myi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung / so so yang dag par rig
29b4('bum): pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung / byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzung / snying rje chen pos yongs su ma bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
29b5('bum): kyis yongs su ma bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyi sa yongs su ma bzung / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyi da kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam pa thams cad
29b6('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyedad pa nyid du myi 'byung ngo // rab 'byor da de
29b7('bum): ji ltar na/ gang zag byang chub sems dpa' theg pa pa thabs myi mkhas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thog mar thabs myed par sbyin pa
29b8('bum): yongs su gtong / thabs myed par tshul khrims srung / thabs myed par bzod pa skom thabs myed par brtson 'grus rtsom thabs myed par bsam gtan la snyoms par
30a1('bum): 'jug/ thabs myed par shes rab sgom zhing de 'di snyam du sems ste/ bdag ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // sbyir ba ni 'di yongs su gtong ngo // 'di la mi
30a2('bum): sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // bdag ni tshul khrims srung ngo // tshul khrims ni 'di srung ngo // bdag ni bzod pa skom mo/ bzod pa ni 'di sgom mo/ bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo
30a3('bum): brtson 'grus ni 'di rtsom mo bdag ni bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug go/ bsam gtan ni 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug go/ bdag ni shes rab sgom mo/ shes rab ni 'di
30a4('bum): sgom mo zhes de sbyin pa rlom sems su byed/ sbyin pas rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o zhes no// ma sems su byed/ de tshul khrims rlom sems su byed
30a5('bum): tshul khrims kyis rlom sems su byed/ bad ga ni chu/ la khrims dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de bzod pa rlom sems su byed/ bzod pas rlom sems
