30a6('bum): su byed/ bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de brtson 'grus rlom sems su byed/ brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan
30a7('bum): pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de bsam gtan rlom sems su byed/ bsam gtan gyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni bsam gtan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de shes
30a8('bum): rab rlom sems su byed/ shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed pa ste// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji ltar de rnam par rtog
30b1('bum): ba'i rnam par rtog pa de dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyind pa de ni pha rol tu phyind pa
30b2('bum): myed pa'o// lce de na mar to mi rnam par rtog pa de dag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol
30b3('bum): tu phyi nad pa de ni pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa'o// ji ltar de rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni
30b4('bum): 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin/ dad pa de ni pha rold tu phyind pa myed pa'o// ji lta dar de rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag brtsona'
30b5('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myed do// de 'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ brtson 'a/ grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de ni pha rol tu phyind pa myed
30b6('bum): pa'o// ji ltar de rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ bsam
30b7('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa de ni pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa'o// ji ltar de rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myed de// de ci'i phyir
30b8('bum): zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de ni pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa'o// de lta yin yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ni ring du song ba
31a1('bum): yang myi shes/ pha rol da yang myi shes ste/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzung /
31a2('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol du phyi nad pas yongs su ma bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzung / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzung
31a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pas yongs su ma bzung // nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
31a4('bum): ma bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung // don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung
31a5('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 2dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
31a6('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chos thos
31a7('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dngos po myed pa
31a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung // dran pa nye bar
31b1('bum): gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su ma bzungardzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su ma 'thung dbang po rnams kyis/
31b2('bum): yongs su ma bzung / stobs rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su ma
31b3('bum): bzung 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / tshad myed pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzugs
31b4('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
31b5('bum): pa dgus yongs su ma 'jung rnam par tha sgo ba nyid da mtshan ma myed bdung nang pa myed pas yongs su ma bzung mngon
31b6('bum): shes pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / ting nge 'dzin donams kyis yongs su ma bcung gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
31b7('bum): bcus yongs su ma bzung / myi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung / byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bza
31b8('bum): nying rje chen pos yongs sus bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / lam gyi rnam pa
32a1('bum): shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung /
32a2('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du myi 'byung ngo // rab 'byor de ji ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / thabs mkhas pas
32a3('bum): yongs su bzung ba nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung zhing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'grub par 'gyur ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor
32a4('bum): 'di la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thog mar sbyin pa yongs su gtong na/ bdag dang bad ga kar bya bar ma ltung ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa yongs
32a5('bum): su gtong ngo / tshul khrims srung na bdag dang bdag gir bya bar ma ltung ba'i sems kyis tshul khrims srung ngo // bzod pa sgom na bdag dang bdag gir bya bar ma lhung ba'i
32a6('bum): sems kyis bzod pa sgom mo/ brtson 'grus rtsom na bdag dang bdag kir bya bar ma ltung ba'i sems kyis brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ bsam gtan sgom na bdag dang bdag
32a7('bum): gir bya bar ma ltung ba'i sems kyis bsam gtan sgom mo/ shes rab sgom na bdag dang bdag kir bya bar ma ltung ba'i sems kyis shes rab sgom ste// de 'di snyam du bdag
32a8('bum): ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong po 'di la sbyin pa gtang ngo zhes bya bar myi sems so// bdag ni tshul khrims srung ngo / tshul khrims ni 'di srung ngo zhes bya bar myi sems so/
32b1('bum): bdag ni bzod pa sgom mo/ bzod pa ni 'di sgom mo zhes bya bar myi sems so// bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ brtson 'grus ni 'di rtsom mo zhes bya bar myi sems so//
32b2('bum): bdag ni bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug go/ bsam gtan ni 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug go zhes bya bar myi sems so// bdag ni shes rab sgom mo/ shes rab
32b3('bum): ni 'di sgom mo zhes bya bar myi sems te/ de sbyin pa rlom sems su myi byed sbyin pas rlom sems su myi byed/ bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems su myi
32b4('bum): byed do// tshul khrims rlom sems su myi byed tshul khrims kyis rlom sems su myi byed bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems su myi byed do//
32b5('bum): bzod pa rlom sems su myi byed/ bzod pas rlom/ sems su myi byed/ bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan ba'o zhes bya bar rlom sems su myi byed do// brtson
32b6('bum): 'grus chom sems su myi byedabartson 'grus kyis rlom sems su myi byed bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o/ zhes bya bar rlom sems su myi byed do/
32b7('bum): bsam gtan rnams rlom sems su myi byedabasam gtan rnams kyis rlom sem su myi byed/ bdag ni bsam gtan pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems su myi byed do// shes rab
32b8('bum): chom sems su myi byedashes rab kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems su myi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di la
33a1('bum): gang gis de rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa la myed de/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni pha rol du phyi nad pa myed
33a2('bum): pa'o// de ni 'di ltar de rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myed de/ 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni pha
33a3('bum): rol tu phyi nad pa myed pa'o// de ni 'di ltar de rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa la myed de/ 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
33a4('bum): pa ni pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa'o// de ni ltar de rmo/ ma sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myed de/ 'di ltar
33a5('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ni pha rol tu phyi nad pa myed pa'o// de ni 'di ltar de rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni bsam ga tan gyi
33a6('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la myed de/ 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa ni pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa'o// de ni 'di ltar de rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag
33a7('bum): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myed de/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni pha rol du phyind pa myed pa'o// de lta yin la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg
33a8('bum): pa pa de yang ring du song ba shes shing pha rol shes te/ des kyang rlom sems su myi byed cing de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pas yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
33b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar gyi lung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
33b2('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyis
33b3('bum): 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi srung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung bas
33b4('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar gyi lu ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grudapar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
33b5('bum): bas yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi lung ste/ rnam pa thams da mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// shes
33b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro//
33b7('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro//
33b8('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar gyi lung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/
34a1('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par/
34a2('bum): 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub
34a3('bum): par 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas d+ha/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar gyi srung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang
34a4('bum): 'grub par 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams
34a5('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi lhung
34a6('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi/
34a7('bum): sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am
34a8('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar gyi lung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye nang pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// thog sa dang pa ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nya
34b1('bum): zos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas
34b2('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas
34b3('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas
34b4('bum): ldan thos kyis 'amarang sangs rgyas kyi sar gyi hUM/ paste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang pa nyid grub par 'gyur ro/ rang gi mtshas nyid stong
34b5('bum): nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyis rang sangs rgyas kyi sar gyi ltung ste/ rnapa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro//
34b6('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par
34b7('bum): 'gyur ro// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nya thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar gyi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
34b8('bum): kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// ngobo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi mar gyi lung ste/ rnam pa thams cad
35a1('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas/
35a2('bum): kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
35a3('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi lhung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan
35a4('bum): thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi lhung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'dradab par 'gyur ro/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
35a5('bum): kyis yongs su bzung bsanyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/
35a6('bum): dbang po rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi lung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/
35a7('bum): stobs rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar gyi lung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro//
35a8('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar gyi lung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par
35b1('bum): 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend
35b2('bum): pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams
35b3('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa
35b4('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// chad myed pa bzhi yis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung
35b5('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grubapar 'gyur ro// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'du ga pa bzhi yis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos
35b6('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung bas
35b7('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'amarang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
35b8('bum): dkyus yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar gyi lung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ rnam par thar
35'a1('bum): rnams zab/ ji ltar na stobs rnams zab/ ji ltar na byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zab/ ji ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zab/ ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zab/
35'a2('bum): ji ltar na bsam gtan rnams zab/ ji ltar na chad myed pa rnams zab// ji ltar na gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zab/ ji ltar na rnam par tha rad pa rnams zab/ ji ltar na mtha rad kyis
35'a3('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zab/ ji ltar na rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa zab/ ji ltar na mngon par shes pa rnams zab/ ji ltar na ting
35'a4('bum): nge 'dzind rnams zab/ ji ltar na gzungs kyi sgo rnams zab ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams zab/ ji ltar na myi 'jigs pa rnams zab/ ji ltar na so so yang dag par
35'a5('bum): rig pa rnams zab ji ltar na byams pa chen po zab/ ltar na snying rje chen po zab/ ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad zab/ ji ltar na rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i/
35'a6('bum): 'bras bu zab/ ji ltar na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zab/ ji ltar na phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zab/ ji ltar na dgra bcom pa nyid zab/ ji ltar na rang byang chub zab/ ji ltar malam gyi rnam pa/
35'a7('bum): shes pa nyid bab/ ji snga ra na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen du pa nyid zab ce na// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du gzugs zab bo// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du tshor ba zab bo//
35'a8('bum): 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du 'du shes zab bo// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du 'du byed zab bo// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lte ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa zatho
35'b1('bum): myig gi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du myig zab bo// rna ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rna ba zab bo// sna'i de bzhin nyid sa de bzhin du sna zab bo// lce'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lce
35'b2('bum): zab bo// lus kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lus zab bo// yid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du yid zab bo// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du gzugs zab bo// sgra'i ni
35'b3('bum): bzhin nyid ril pa de bzhin dus chub bo// dri'i de bzhin nyid dris pa de bzhidi du drim mtho/ roming mazhin nyid rjes pa de bzhin du rozab bo// reg gi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du reg zab mo// chom kyi
35'b4('bum): de bzhin nyi nges pa de bzhin ma chos 'ba'o// sa shes pa dzi bzhin nyid 'de bzhinan na sa pa shes pa ba // ma ba'i rnam pa shes pa'i 'di
35'b5('bum): nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zab bo// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du sngal rnam par shes pa zab bo// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin
35'b6('bum): nyid de lta ba de bzhin du lce'i rnam par shes pa zab bo// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin su lus kyi rnam par shes pa zab bo// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid pa
35'b7('bum): pa de bzhin du yid kyi rnam par shes pa zab bo// myika gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du myig gi 'dus te reg pa zab bo// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhi
35'b8('bum): du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zab bo// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du snga'i 'dus te reg pa zab bo// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lce'i 'dus te reg
36a1('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / spon pa myed pas yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste
36a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung
36a3('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung
36a4('bum): ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'gru ba par 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
36a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin ga shegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung bas
36a6('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// myi 'jigs pa bzhi yis yongs su bzung bas
36a7('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'amarang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yis yongs su
36a8('bum): bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sa ngas rgyas kyi sar gyi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye nang pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// byams pa chen pos yongs su
36b1('bum): bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi lung ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung bas
36b2('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs
36b3('bum): su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs
36b4('bum): su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ ra sangs rgyas kyi sar gyi lung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// lam kyi rnam
36b5('bum): pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar gyi ltung ste/ ma pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro//
36b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// /
36b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po gsum pa'o// / rab 'byor de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa
37a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung ba thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung ba
37a2('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung ba bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung ba tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pas yongs su bzung ba
37a3('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung ba// nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
37a4('bum): bzung ba stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzla dang ba chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba
37a5('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba/ thal las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/
37a6('bum): thog pa dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba chos thas
37a7('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ dngos po myed pa
37a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ drang pa nye bar
37b1('bum): gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ dbang pa'o//
37b2('bum): rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba stobs rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba'aphags pa'i lam yan lag
37b3('bum): brgyad pas yongs su bzung ba'aphags pa'i bden pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba bsam gtan bzhis yongs su bzung ba tshad myed pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba/
37b4('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba/ rnam par thar da pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
37b5('bum): 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung ba/ rnam par tharapa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smo nad pa myed pas yongs su bzung ba mngon par
37b6('bum): shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba ting nge 'dzind rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus
37b7('bum): yongs su bzung ba myi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba/ byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung ba/ snying rje
37b8('bum): chen pos yongs su bzung ba sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
38a1('bum): nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyis yongasasu bzung ba de// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi lhung ngo // rang
38a2('bum): 'byor da ji ltar na gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thabs mkhas pas yongasu bzung ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thog mar zabs
38a3('bum): dang ldan par sbyin pa yongs su gtong / thabs dang ldan par tshul khrims srung / thabs dang ldan par bzod pa bsgom thabs dang ldan par brtson 'grus rtsom thabs dang ldan
38a4('bum): bar bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug/ thabs dang / da ldan par shes rab sgom zhing 'di ltar de bdag ni sbyin pa yod/ sa su gtong ngo // sbyin pa 'di yongs su gtong ngo /
38a5('bum): 'di la sbyin pa yongs su gtang ngo snyam du myi sems so// 'di ltar bdag ni tshul khrims srung ngo // tshul khrims ni 'di srung ngo snyam du myi sems so// 'di ltar bdag ni
38a6('bum): bzod pa bsgom mo/ bzod pa ni 'di sgom mo snyam du myi sems so// 'di ltar bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ brtson 'grus ni 'di rtsom mo snyam du myi sems so// 'di ltar
38a7('bum): bdag ni bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug go/ bsam gtan ni 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug go snyam du myi sems so// 'di ltar bdag ni shes rab sgom mo/ shes rab
38a8('bum): ni 'di sgom mo snyam du myi sems so// de sbyin pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sbyin bas rlom sems su myi byed/ bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o zhes rlom sems su myi byed do// de tshul
38b1('bum): khrims rlom sems su myi byed/ tshul khrims kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o zhes sems su myi byed do// de bzod pa rlom sems su myi byed/ bzod
38b2('bum): pas rlom sems su myi byed/ bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su myi byed do// de brtson 'grus rlom sems su myi byed/ brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su myi byed/
38b3('bum): bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su myi byed do// de bsam gtan rlom sem/ sa su myi byed/ bsam gtan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ bdag ni bsam gtan pa'o//
38b4('bum): zhes rlom sems su myi byed do// de shes rab rlom sem/ sa su myi byed/ shes rab kyis rlom sems su myi byed bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su myi byed do//
38b5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar de rnam par myi rtog pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag myed de de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di sa ste/
38b6('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa de ni pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// de ltar de rnam par myi rtog pas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa de la rnam par rtog pa de dag myed de/ de ci'i phyir/
38b7('bum): sa de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de ni pha rol tu phyidad pa myed pa'o// de ltar de rnam par myi rtog pas/ bzod kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rnam
38b8('bum): par rtog pa de dag myed de de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di sa re/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa de ni pha rolal tu phyind pa myed pa'o// de sar de rnam par gyi rtog pas/
39a1('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rnam pa ga pa dag da'i phyi na'adu 'dis 'di / sngon 'grus kyis so phyidad pa de ni ma
39a2('bum): tu phyind pa myed pa'o// de ltar de rnam par myi rtog pas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/
39a3('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa de ni pha rol tu phyi nga pa myed pa'o// de lar nge rnam par myi rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol la tu phyi rang pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag myed de/ de ci
39a4('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de ni pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa'o// de lta yang yin la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
39a5('bum): pa de yang ring du song ba shes shing pha rol shes kyang / des rlom sems myed de/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol
39a6('bum): tu phyind pas yongs su bzung ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung ba dang / bsam
39a7('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung ba dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba dang // rang /
39a8('bum): pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung
39b1('bum): dang chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang dod dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'dus
39b2('bum): 'bras stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / thog ma dang bra ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
39b3('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rang
39b4('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
39b5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zung ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis
39b6('bum): yongs su bzung ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rdzu 'phrus kyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dbang po rnams kyis yongs su
39b7('bum): bzung ba dang / stobs rnams kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su
39b8('bum): bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / bsam gtan bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / tshad myed pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang
40a1('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / mthar da kyis gnas
40a2('bum): ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pas yongs su bzung ba dang
40a3('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / de bzhin
40a4('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung ba dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / so so// yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang
40a5('bum): byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung ba dang / snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
40a6('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas
40a7('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa stong phrag brgya
40a8('bum): pa las lelu sum cu drug/
40b1('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das las dang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab
40b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la bslab par bgyi
40b3('bum): ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bgyi//
40b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor/ 'di la las dang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bslab par 'dod
40b5('bum): pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa bslab bar 'dod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bslab par 'dod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
40b6('bum): phyind pa bslab par 'dod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyind pa bslab par 'dod pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bslab par 'dod pas// dge ba'i bshes nyen kang
40b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stond pa/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa stond pa/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ston pa/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ston pa pa
40b8('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ston pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ston pa/ de dag la bstend par bya'o// bsnyend par bya'o// bsnyen bkur bar bya'o//
41a1('bum): dag de la shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di ltar stond te/ chur rigs kyi bu sbyin pa gang dang gang sbyin pa de thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
41a2('bum): yongs su sngos shig// tshur rigs kyi bu tshul khrims gang dang gang srung ba de thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo shig/ tshur rigs kyi bu bzod pa
41a3('bum): gang dang gang sgrub pa de thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo shig/ tshur rigs kyi bu brtson 'grus gang dang gang rtsom pa de thams cad bla na myed pa yang
41a4('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo shig/ tshur rigs kyi bu bsam gtan kang dang gapal snyoms para'ajug pa de thams cad bla ra myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
41a5('bum): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo shig/ tshur rigs kyi bu shes rab gang dang gang sgom pa de thams cad bla na myed pa ya ba dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo shig/
41a6('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gzugs su rtog par ma byed cig/ tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig/ 'du shes su rtog par ma byed cag
41a7('bum): 'du byed du rtog par ma byed cig/ rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig/ myig tu rtog par ma byed cig/ rna bar rtog par ma byed cig/ sngar rtog par ma byed cig
41a8('bum): ser rtog par ma byed cig/ lus su rtog par ma byed cig yid du rtog par ma byed cig/ gzugs su rtog par ma byed cig/ slar rtog par ma byed cig
41b1('bum): dri rtog par ma byed cig/ ror rtog par ma byed cig/ reg tu rtog par ma byed cig/ chos su rtog par ma byed cig/ myig gi rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig
41b2('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig/ sna'i rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig/ lce'i rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig/ lus kyi rnam par shes par
41b3('bum): rtog par ma byed cig/ yid kyi rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig// myig gi 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig
41b4('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig/ lce/ 'i 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig/ lus/ kyi 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig/ yid
41b5('bum): kyi 'dus te reg par ma byed cig/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor bar rtog par ma
41b6('bum): byed cig/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
41b7('bum): rkyend kyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig// rigs kyi bu khyod bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
41b8('bum): sa'i khams su rtog par ma byed cig/ chu'i khams su rtog par ma byed cig/ mye'i khams su rtog par ma byed cig/ rlung gi khams su rtog par ma byed cig/ nam
42a1('bum): mkha'i khams su rtog par ma byed cig/ rnam par shes pa'i khams su rtog par ma byed cig/ ma rig par rtog par ma byed cig/ 'du byed du rtog par ma byed
42a2('bum): cig rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig/ mying dang gzugs su rtog par ma byed cig/ skye mched drug tu rtog par ma byed cig/ reg par rtog par ma byed cig
42a3('bum): tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig/ sred par rtog par ma byed cig/ le nad par rtog par ma byed cig/ srid par rtog par ma byed cig/ skye bar rtog par ma byed cig/ rga shir
42a4('bum): rtog par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi bu khyod bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sbyin pa'i pha ro// lang tu phyind par rtog par ma byed cig/ tshul khris
42a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyi nad par rtog par ma byed cig/ bzo pa'i pha rol tu phyind par rtog par byed cig/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad par rtog par ma byed cig
42a6('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind par rtog par ma byed cig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par rtog par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi bu khyod bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
42a7('bum): pa'i byang chub nang stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ phyi stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ phyi nang stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ stong pa nyid stong pa
42a8('bum): nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ chen po stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ don dam pa stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed
42b1('bum): cig 'dus ma byas stob pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du rtog par ma khyed cig thog ma dpatha ma myed pa stong pa nyid du rtog
42b2('bum): par ma byed cig/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig
42b3('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ ngo bo nyid stong
42b4('bum): pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig rigs kyi bu khyod tha na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
42b5('bum): byang chub / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su rtog/ par ma byed cig/ yang dag par spong ba rnams su ka par ma byed cig/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
42b6('bum): su tog par ma byed cig dbang po rnams su rtog par ma byed cig/ stobs rnams su rtog par ma byed cig/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su rtog par ma byed cig/
42b7('bum): rnams su rtog par ma byed cig/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhir rtog par ma byed cig/ bsam gtan bzhir rtog par ma khyed cig/ chang myed pa bzhir rtog par ma byed cig/
42b8('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhir rtog par ma byed cig/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad du rtog par ma byed cig/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu chog
43a1('bum): par ma byed cig/ rnam par thar da pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed par rtog par ma byed cig/ mngon par shes pa rnams su
43a2('bum): rtog par ma byed cig/ ting nge 'dzind rnams su rtog par ma byed cig/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams su rtog par ma byed cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcur rtog par ma byed cig/
43a3('bum): myi 'jigs pa bzhir rtog par ma byed cig/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhir rtog par ma byed cig/ byams pa chen por rtog par ma byed cig/ snying rje chen por rtog par ma byed
43a4('bum): cig/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgya dad du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtog par ma byed cig/ thams cad shes pa nyid du rtog par ma
43a5('bum): byed cig/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du rto/ ka par ma byed cig// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yongs
43a6('bum): su ma brtags pa'i gzugs ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i tshor ba ni rnam po thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su
43a7('bum): ma brtags pa'i 'du shes ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i 'du byed ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs
43a8('bum): su ma brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i myig ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do//
43b1('bum): yongs su ma brtags pa'i rna ba mirnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma btugs pa'i snga ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su
43b2('bum): ma btags pa'i lce ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i lus ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su
43b3('bum): btags pa'i yid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su sa brtags pa'i gzugs mirnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs
43b4('bum): ma brtags pa'i sgra ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyi da thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i dri ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do/
43b5('bum): yongs su ma brtags pa'i ron rnam pa thams cad mar+g+ha dad pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i reg mi rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed
43b6('bum): do/ yongs su ma btags pa'i chos ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i myig gi rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/
43b7('bum): nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i sna'i rnam par shes pa
43b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i lce'i rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtag
44a1('bum): pa'i lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
44a2('bum): nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i myig gi 'dus te reg pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i rna ba'i 'dus te reg
44a3('bum): pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma
44a4('bum): brtags pa'i lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma bar+Nadags pa'i lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni rnam pa thams cad
44a5('bum): mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtag/ sa pa'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags
44a6('bum): pa'i myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba ni rnam
44a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs
44a8('bum): su ma brtags pa'i lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
44b1('bum): tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par
44b2('bum): byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i sa'i khams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i chu'i khams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
44b3('bum): pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i mye'i khams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i rlung gi khams ni rnam pa
44b4('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yod sa su ma brtags pa'i nam mkha' khams ni rnam pa tha dmas cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs
44b5('bum): su ma brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i ma rig pa ni rnam pa thams
44b6('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i 'du byed ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa ni
44b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i mying dang gzugs ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags
44b8('bum): pa'i skye mched drug ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i reg pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma
45a1('bum): brtags pa'i tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i sred pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do//
45a2('bum): yongs su ma brtags pa'i le nad pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i srid pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs
45a3('bum): su ma brtags pa'i skye ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i rga shi ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma
45a4('bum): btags pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa ni rnam pa thams// cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma// brtags pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ni rnam
45a5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasasu
45a6('bum): ma btags pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyind pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rnam pa zas
45a7('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i
45a8('bum): nang stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i phyi stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtag
45b1('bum): pa'i phyi nang stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhye dang pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs
45b2('bum): su ma brtags pa'i chen po stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i don dam pa stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob
45b3('bum): par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni
45b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do/
45b5('bum): yongs su ma brtags pa'i thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong panyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni
45b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtag
45b7('bum): pa'i chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
45b8('bum): thob par byed do// yongs su ma btags pa'i myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i dngos po myed pa stong
46a1('bum): pa nyid rirnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su sa brtags pa ringo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do//
46a2('bum): yongs su ma brtags pa'i dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni
46a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i yang dag par spong ba rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su
46a4('bum): ma brtags pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yo ngas su ma brtags pa'i dbang po rnams ni rnam pa zas
46a5('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i stobs rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags
46a6('bum): pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni rnam pa thams cad
46a7('bum): mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ri rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma bcag
46a8('bum): ba'i phas pa gtam rnams nirnam pa thams can ma khyen da pa nyid thob par byer ro// yongs su ma btags pa'i tshad byed bu rnams mirnam pa thams cad mkhye nang pa nyid 'os
46b1('bum): byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do/ yongs su ma brtags pa'i rnam par/
46b2('bum): tha rad pa brgyad ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
46b3('bum): pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
46b4('bum): nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa/ 'i mngon par shes pa rnams ni rnam pa thams cad ma khyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma
46b5('bum): brtags pa'i ting nge 'dzind rnams ni rnam pa thams nga mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni rnam pa thams
46b6('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtag
46b7('bum): pa'i myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob
46b8('bum): par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i byams pa chen po rin pa thams cad mkhyen pa pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su sa btags pa'i snying rje chen po mi rnam pa thams cad
48a1('bum): mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do/ yongs su ma brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par
48a2('bum): byed do/ yongs su ma brtags pa'i thams cad shes pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do/ yongs su ma brtags pa'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
48a3('bum): nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// rigs kyi bu khyod gzugs la 'dod pa ma skyed cigade ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa
48a4('bum): ni gzugs sotshor ba la 'dod pa ma skyed ka de ci'i phyir zhe na rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni tshor ba'o// 'du shes la 'dod pa ma
48a5('bum): skyed cig de ci'i phyir zhe na rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni 'du shes so/ 'du byed la 'a dod pa ma skyed cig de ci'i phyir zhen rigs
48a6('bum): kyi bu 'dod pa myed ba ni 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni rnam par shes pa'o// myig la
48a7('bum): 'dod pa ma skyed cig de ci'i phyir zhe na rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni myig go rna ba la 'dod pa ma skyed cig de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa
48a8('bum): myed pa ni rna ba'o/ sA la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni sna'o/ lce la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na
48b1('bum): rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni sde'o// lus la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa lus so// yid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de
48b2('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa ni yid do// gzugs la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni gzugs so// sbru la 'dod/
48b3('bum): pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni smra'o// dri la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni dri'o/
48b4('bum): rol 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni ro'o// re ka la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi
48b5('bum): bu 'dod pa myed pa ni reg go/ chos la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni chos so// myig gi rnam par
48b6('bum): shes pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa na myig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/
48b7('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod
48b8('bum): pa myed pa ni snga'i rnam par shes pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni rnam par shes pa'o// lus
49a1('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig de ci'i phyir zhe na rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes
49a2('bum): tha ma 'dod tha ma skyed cig de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de
49a3('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na rigs kyi bu 'dod pa
49a4('bum): myed pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ sna'i 'dusate reg pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig de ci'i phyir zhe na rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o/
49a5('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cigade ci'i phyir zhenarigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni l+le 'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
49a6('bum): la 'dod pa ma skyed cig de ci'i phyir zhe na rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig de ci'i phyir
49a7('bum): zhen rigs kyi gru 'dod pa myed pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba la 'dod pa ma skyed cig de ci'i phyir zhe na rigs kyi
49a8('bum): bu 'dod pa myed pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba la 'dod pa ma skyed cig de ci'i phyir zhe na rigs kyi bu
49b1('bum): 'dod pa myed pa mi na ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa
49b2('bum): myed pa ni snga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// sde'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni sde'i
49b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni lus kyi 'dus te res
49b4('bum): pa'i phyi rad kyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i gyi zhes/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni yid kyi 'dus
49b5('bum): reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigasakyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni sa'i khams so/ chu'i khams
49b6('bum): la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rig sa kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni chu'i khams so// mye'i khams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu
49b7('bum): 'dod pa myed pa ni mye'i khams so// rlung gi khams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni rlung gi khams so// nam mkha' khams la 'dod
49b8('bum): pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni nam mkha'i khams so// rnam par shes pa'i khams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs
50a1('bum): kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni rnam par shes pa'i khams so// ma rig pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni ma rig pa'o// 'du
50a2('bum): byed la 'dod pa ma skyed cig de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni 'du byed do/ rnam par shes pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa
50a3('bum): myed pa ni rnam par shes pa'o// mying dang gzugs la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni mying dang gzugs so/ skye mched drug la 'dod pa
50a4('bum): ma skyed cig de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'do dad pa myed pa ni skye mched drug ko reg pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig de ci'i phyir zhe na rigs kyi bu 'dod pa
50a5('bum): myed pa ni reg pa'o/ tshor ba la 'dod pa ma skyed ci ka de ci'i phyir zhe na rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni tshor ba'o// sred pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig
50a6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni sred pa'o/ lend pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni le nad pa'o/ srid pa la
50a7('bum): 'dod pa ma skyed cig de ci'i phyir zhe na rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni srid pa'o// skye ba la 'dod pa ma skyed cig de ci'i phyir zhe na rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni skye ba'o//
50a8('bum): rgag la 'dod pa ma skyed cig de ci'i phyir zhe na rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni rga shi'o/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na
50b1('bum): rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyi nad pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni tshul khrims kyi/
50b2('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// brtson 'grus
50b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la 'dod pa
50b4('bum): ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/
50b5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa'o// nang stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rig
50b6('bum): kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni nang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni phyi stong pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid la
50b7('bum): 'dod pa ma skyed cigade ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni phyi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs
50b8('bum): kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni chen po stong pa nyid do/
51a1('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dod
51a2('bum): pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs
51a3('bum): kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni mtha' las
51a4('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni thog ma dang
51a5('bum): ma myed pa stong pa nyid do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid do/
51a6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/
51a7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu
51a8('bum): 'dod pa myed pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa
51b1('bum): ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid do// ngo bo
51b2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig
51b3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhem/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhen
51b4('bum): rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong ba rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ legs rgya su 'dod
51b5('bum): pa ma skyed cig/ da cil phyir zhe ma/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni yang dag par spong ba rnams so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la 'dod pa ma spyad cig/
51b6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// dbang po rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod
51b7('bum): pa myed pa ni dbang po rnams so// stobs rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni stobs rnams so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnaMs
51b8('bum): la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/
52a1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir/
52a2('bum): zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/ bsam gtan rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni bsam
52a3('bum): gtan rnams so// chad myed pa rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni tshad myed pa nas so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
52a4('bum): rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la
52a5('bum): 'dod pa ma skyed cig de ci'i phyir zhe na rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni rnam par tha rad pa brgyad do/ ma tha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la 'dod
52a6('bum): ba ma skyed cig de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
52a7('bum): dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
52a8('bum): myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni mngon par shes pa rnams so/ ting
52b1('bum): nge 'dzind rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni ting nge 'dzind rnams so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe/
52b2('bum): rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni de ba
52b3('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// myi 'jigs bzhi la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni myi 'jigs pa rnams so// so so yang dag par
52b4('bum): rig pa rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyirazhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni so so yang dag padar rig pa rnams so// byams pa chen po la 'dod pa
52b5('bum): ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'a dod pa myed pa ni byams pa chen po'o// snying rje chen po la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs
52b6('bum): kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni snying rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos
52b7('bum): ma 'dres pa rnams so// thams cad shes pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni thams cad shes pa nyid do// lam gyi rnam pa shes
52b8('bum): pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig
53a1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// rigs kyi bu khyod rgyu nang du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'dod pa ma skyed cig
53a2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni rgyu nang du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba lus bu 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed
53a3('bum): pa ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o//
53a4('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni dgra bco ma pa nyid do/ rang byang chub la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/
53a5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni rang byang chub bo/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
53a6('bum): rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo zhes bya bar 'gyur ro//
53a7('bum): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolar to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos rnams kyi rang gi mtshan
53a8('bum): nyid kyi stong pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smond cingabla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
53b1('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'chal ba ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ra
53b2('bum): 'byor da de ltar chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'dod pa ni dka' ba byed pa'o// /
53b3('bum): rab 'byor nga 'ond kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang / rmyi lam lta bur rig nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
53b4('bum): du yang dag par zhugs pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni 'jig rten gyi don dang phar pa dang bde ba'i phyir bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzog
53b5('bum): pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs so// jig rten gyi mgon tu 'gyur bar bya'o zhes/ bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag
53b6('bum): par zhugs so// 'jig rten gyi skyabs su 'gyur ba ra bya'o zhes bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs so// 'jig rten gyi rten du 'gyur bar
53b7('bum): bya'o zhes bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs so// 'jig rten kyi dpung nyen du 'gyur bar bya'o zhes bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
53b8('bum): tu yang dag par zhugs so/ 'jig rten gyi gling du 'gyur bar bya'o zhes bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs so// 'jig rten gyi snang bar 'gyur
54a1('bum): bar bya'o zhes bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs so// 'jig rten gyi sgron ma 'dzind cing 'od 'byind pa dang / ded dpon dang yongs
54a2('bum): su 'drend par 'gyur bar bya'o zhes bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs so// 'jig rten gyi lam du 'gyur bar bya'o zhes bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
54a3('bum): pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs so//
54a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po bzhi pa'o// / rab 'byor da ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na
54a5('bum): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya b.ra'adod cing 'jig rten gyi don gyi phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub
54a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen posbyin bci gtong ba de thams cad kyang sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir ro// tshul khrims ji srung ba de thams cad kyang seMs
54a7('bum): can rnams kyi sdug bsngal yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir ro// bzod pa ci sgom pa de thams cad kyang sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir ro// brtson 'grus ci rtsom pa
54a8('bum): de thams cad kyang sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir ro// gang la bsam gtan mnyam par gzhog pa de thams cad kyang sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal yongs su
54b1('bum): dgrol ba'i phyir ro/ shes rab ci sgom pa de thams cad kyang sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
54b2('bum): dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod cing 'jig rten gyi don gyi phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// rab 'byor
54b3('bum): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can
54b4('bum): rnams 'gro ba'i rgyud lnga nas yongs su bton cingadamyi 'jigs pa'i thang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la ra du 'god de rab 'byor da de ltar na byang chub sems
54b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'dod cing 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir yang dag par
54b6('bum): zhugs pa yin no// rab 'byor da ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten la bde ba'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin zhe na rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub seMs
54b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bA na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'dod pa sems can rnams sdug bsngal dang yid myi bde ba dang / 'khrug
54b8('bum): pa rnams las yongs su bkrol zhing myi 'jigs pa'i zang bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu 'god derab 'byor nga de ltar na byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po bla na
55a1('bum): myed pa yang dka par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod cing 'jig rten la bde ba'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// rang
55a2('bum): 'byor da ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod cing 'jig rten gyi mgon byed pa yin zhe
55a3('bum): rab 'byor da 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa 'khor ba na yod pa'i sdug
55a4('bum): bsngal ga ci yang rung ste/ de dag las sems can da rnams yongs su skyob cing de dag spang ba'i phyir chos stond te sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas rim gyis
55a5('bum): theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyurate/ rab 'byor da de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
55a6('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'dod pas 'jig rten gyi mgon byed pa yin no// rab 'byor da ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
55a7('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa 'jig rten gyi skyabs su gyu rad pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor da 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag
55a8('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa sems can skye ba'i chos can dang sems can rga ba'i chos can dang/ sems can na ba'i chos can dngaseMs
55b1('bum): can 'chi ba'i chos can dang / sems can mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'dond pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i chos can rnams skye ba dang / rga ba dang
55b2('bum): sab dang 'chib dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid kyi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su bkrol zhing / phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan
55b3('bum): las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las zlo/ rab 'byor da de ltar ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
55b4('bum): 'chang rgya bar 'dod pa 'jig rten gyi bsgrubs su gyuradapa dar ro// rab 'byor ma'i ltar ma byang chub sems dpal rnams dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
55b5('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'dod pa/ mas can rnams kyi rten tu gyu rang pa yin zhe na/ rab khyo rang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tha
55b6('bum): na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs por 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa chos thams cad 'dre ba myed par chos stond te// rab 'byor da de ltar na byang chub sems dpal sems
55b7('bum): dpa' chen po bla ra myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'dod pa/ sems can rnams kyi rten tu gyu rad pa yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
55b8('bum): 'das ji ltar na chos thams cad 'dre ba ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de gzugs kyi 'dre ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi
56a1('bum): 'brel pa myed pa'o// gzugs kyi 'brel pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi skye ba myed pa'o// gzugs kyi skye ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi 'gag pa
56a2('bum): myed pa'o// gzugs kyi 'gag pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi 'dre ba myed pa'o// tshor ba'i 'dre ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni tshor ba'i 'brel pa myed pa'o// tshor ba'i 'brel pa
56a3('bum): myed pa gang yin pa de ni tshor ba'i skye ba myed pa'o// tshor ba'i skye ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ tshor ba'i 'gag pa myed pa'o// tshor ba'i 'gag pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni tshor ba'i 'dre ba myed pa'o/
56a4('bum): 'du shes kyi 'dre ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni 'du shes kyi 'brel pa myed pa'o// 'du shes kyi 'brel pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'du shes kyi skye ba myed pa'o// 'du shes kyi
56a5('bum): skye ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni 'du shes kyi 'gag pa myed pa'o// 'du shes kyi 'gag pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'du shes kyi 'dre ba myed pa'o// 'du byed kyi 'dre ba myed
56a6('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni 'du byed kyi 'brelang ba myed pa'o// du byed kyi 'brel pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'du byed kyi skye ba myong pa'o// 'du 'byed kyi skye ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni
56a7('bum): 'du byed kyi 'gag pa myed pa'o// 'du byed kyi 'gag pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'du byed kyi 'dre ba myed pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i 'dre ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes
56a8('bum): pa'i 'brel pa myed pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i 'brel pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa'i skye ba myed pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i skye ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni rna
56b1('bum): par shes pa'i 'gag pa myed pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa'i 'dre ba myed pa'o// myig gi 'dre ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ myig
56b2('bum): gi 'brel pa myed pa'o// myig gi 'breld pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni myig gi skye ba myed pa'o// myig gi skye ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni myig gi 'gag pa myed pa'o// myig
56b3('bum): ki 'gag pa myed pa ga yin pa de mi myig gi 'dre ba byed pa'o// rna ba'i 'dre ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i 'brel pa myed pa'o// ma ba'i 'brel pa myed pa gang yin pa de
56b4('bum): mirna ba'i sgra tha myed pa'o/ rna ba'i skye ba myed pa kang yin pa de ni rna ba'i 'gag pa myed pa'o// rna ba'idakag pa myed pa gang yin pa de nirnga ba'i 'dre ba
56b5('bum): myed pa'o// sA'i 'dre ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni sA'i 'brel pa myed pa'o/ sngol 'brel pa myed pa na nga yin pa de ni sna'i skye ba myed pa'o/ snga'i skye ba
56b6('bum): myed pa gang yin pa de ni sna'i 'gag pa myed pa'o/ sna'i 'gag pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni snga'i 'dre ba myed pa'o// lce'i 'dre ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni lce'i 'brel
56b7('bum): pa myed pa'o/ sde'i 'brel pa myed pa gang yin pa de nigre'i skye ba myed pa'o/ lce'i skye ba myed pa gang yin pa de nilce'i 'gag pa myed pa'o/ lde'i 'gag pa myed pa kang
56b8('bum): yin pa de nilce'i 'dre ba myed pa'o// lus kyi 'dre ba myed pa kang yin pa de ni lus kyi 'bres pa myed pa'o/ lus kyi 'brel pa myed pa gang yin pa de nilus
57a1('bum): kyi skye ba myed pa'o// lus kyi skye ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ lus kyi 'gag pa myed pa'o// lus kyi 'gag pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni lus kyi 'dre ba myed pa'o//
57a2('bum): yid kyi 'dre ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'breld pa myed pa'o// yid kyi 'brel pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi skye ba myed pa'o// yid kyi skye ba myed pa gang yin pa
57a3('bum): de ni yid kyi 'gag pa myed pa'o// yid kyi 'gag pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'dre ba myed pa'o// gzugs kyi 'dre ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi la
57a4('bum): 'brel pa myed pa'o// gzugs kyi 'breld pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi skye ba myed pa'o// dgazugs kyi skye ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs
57a5('bum): kyi 'gag pa myed pa'o/ gzugs kyi 'gag pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi 'dra ba myed pa'o// / sgra'i 'dre ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni sgra'i 'brel
57a6('bum): pa myed pa'o/ sma'i 'brel pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni sgra'i skye ba myed pa'o/ sgra'i skye ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni sgra'i 'gag pa myed pa'o/ sgra'i 'gug pa myed pa
57a7('bum): gang yin pa de ni smra'i 'dre ba myed pa'o// dri'i 'dre ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni dri'i 'brel pa myed pa'o// dri'i 'brel pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ dri'i skye ba myed pa'o/
57a8('bum): dri'i skye ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni dri'i 'gag pa myed pa'o// dri'i 'gag pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ dri'i 'dre ba myed pa'o// / ro'i 'dre ba myed pa gang yin pa gang yin
57b1('bum): ba de ni ro'i 'breld pa myed pa'o// ro'i 'brel pa myed pa yin pa de ni/ ro'i skye ba myed pa'o// ro'i skye ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ ro'i 'gag pa myed pa'o// rol la
57b2('bum): 'gag pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni ro'i 'dre ba myed pa'o// reg gi 'dre ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni reg gi 'brel pa myed pa'o// reg gi 'brel pa myed pa gang yin pa
57b3('bum): de nireg gi skye ba myed pa'o// reg gi skye ba myed pa gar yin pa de ni/ reg gi 'gag pa myed pa'o// reg gi 'gag pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni reg gi 'dre ba myed pa'o//
57b4('bum): chos kyi 'dre ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi dbrel ba myed pa'o// chos kyi 'brel pa myed pa ga ngan pa de ni chos kyi skye bskyed pa'o// chos kyi
57b5('bum): skye ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi 'gag pa byed pa'o// chos kyi 'gag pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi 'dre ba myed pa'o// myig gi
57b6('bum): rnam par shes pa'i 'dre ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni myig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'brel pa myed pa'o// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'brelang pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni myig gi
57b7('bum): rnam par shes pa'i skye ba myed pa'o// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i skye ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni myig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa myed pa'o// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'gas
57b8('bum): pa myed bkang yin pa de ni/ myig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'dre ba myed pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'dre ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'brel pa myed
58a1('bum): pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'brel ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i skye ba myed pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i skye ba myed pa gang yin pa
58a2('bum): de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa myed pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'dre ba myed pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes
