84a2('bum): 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na chu klung ngam chu bran nam rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na chus yongs su bcad pa'i gnas gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag ni gling zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du gzug
84a3('bum): ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// tshor ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// 'du shes ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o//
84a4('bum): 'du byed ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chadadapa'o// rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i ma datha' yongs su chad pa'o// / myig ni sngon gyi mtha' dang
84a5('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ rna ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ sna ni sngonagyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o
84a6('bum): ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// lus ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// yid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o//
84a7('bum): gzugs ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ sgra ni sngon gyi mtha' drang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// dri na sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/
84a8('bum): ron sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma 'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// reg ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// chos ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa 'o//
84b1('bum): myig gi rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa ni
84b2('bum): sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i
84b3('bum): mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su
84b4('bum): chad pa'o/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// sna'i 'dus te rekan pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o//
84b5('bum): sde'i 'dus te reg pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' ro ngas su chad pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni sngon mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// yid
84b6('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'og nu ba
84b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// snga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o//
84b8('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su
85a1('bum): chad pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// sa'i khams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su
85a2('bum): chad pa'o// chu'i khams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// mye'i khams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// rlung gi khams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i/
85a3('bum): mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// nam mkha'i khams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khas ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// ma
85a4('bum): rig pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// 'du byed ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs
85a5('bum): su chad pa'o// mying dang gzugs ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi/ ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// skye mched drug ni sngo na gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o//
85a6('bum): reg pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// tshor ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// sred pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o//
85a7('bum): lend pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// srid pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongasasu chad pa'o// skye ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o//
85a8('bum): rga shi ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni
85b1('bum): sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// brtson 'grus// pha rol du phyind pa ni sngon gyi
85b2('bum): mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// shes rab kyi rol tu phyind pa ni sngon gyi mtha'
85b3('bum): dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// nang stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o//
85b4('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// chen po stong pa
85b5('bum): nyid ni sngon gyi mthu dang phyi ma'i mtha yong su chad pa'o// don dam pastong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su mdapa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /
85b6('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' yongasu chad pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chud pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma' mtha' yongs
85b7('bum): su chad pa'o/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/
85b8('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongasu chad pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
86a1('bum): ni sngon gyi mtha ma dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni sngon
86a2('bum): kyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mahA/
86a3('bum): yongs su chad pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pani
86a4('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dayongs su chad pa'o// dbang po rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' da dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// stobs rnams
86a5('bum): ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i ma za' yongs su chad pa'o/ 'phags pa'i lam ya na
86a6('bum): lag brgyad pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// bsam gtan rnams ni sngon
86a7('bum): kyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// tshad myed pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni sngon gyi
86a8('bum): mtha' dang phye ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// rnam par tha rad pa rnams na sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
86b1('bum): ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs
86b2('bum): su chad pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// ting nge 'dzind rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/
86b3('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o//
86b4('bum): myi 'jigs pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/
86b5('bum): byams pa chen po ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yodas su chad pa'o// snying rje chen po ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi
86b6('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// rgyu nang du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// lan cig phyir
86b7('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid ni sngon gyi
86b8('bum): mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// rang byang chub ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su
87a1('bum): chad pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// rab 'byor da sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa 'dis
87a2('bum): chos thams cad yongs su chad pa ste/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa gang yin pa de ni zhi ba'o// de ni yang dag pa ste 'di ltar stong pa nyid dang dmyigs
87a3('bum): su myed pa dang / lam gyi rgyu nad chad pa dang / sred pa zad pa dang / 'dre ba myed pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ rab 'byor da de ltar
87a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tha na myed dpa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs parasangs rgyas nas de ltar zhi ba dang / de ltar bzang
87a5('bum): ba'i chos de dag ston ste/ rab 'byor da de ltar na nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bla na myed pa ya bdag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
87a6('bum): sangs rgyas nasasems can rnams kyi gling du gyur pa yin no//
87a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pabam po drug pa'o// / rab 'byor da ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla ma myed
87a8('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'jig rten gyi spang bar gyur da pa yin zhe ma rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yun dang /
87b1('bum): du ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs kyi rab rib kyis kun nas 'khris shing mun pas zil gyis non pa'i sems can rnams la shes rab kyis snang bar byed cing kati mug gi mun pa dang / ma rig pa'i
87b2('bum): mun nag dang myi shes pa'i rab rib se lad te/ rab 'byor da de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs
87b3('bum): rgyas nas 'jig rten gyi snang bar gyur da pa yin no// rab 'byor da ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
87b4('bum): sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams kyi sgron ma 'dzin da cing 'od 'byin pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub mes 'asems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
87b5('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nasamado sde pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang ldan pa byin gyi rlabs bzhi dang ldan pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang ldan pa/
87b6('bum): dag ni don ma nor par sems can rnams la yang dag par stond te/ sems can rnams kyang de la yang dag par skul zhing sbyor la gzhog cang rab tu 'god de/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
87b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nasasems can rnams kyi sgron ma 'dzind cing 'od 'byin pa yin no// rab 'byor de ji ltar na
87b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams kyi ded dpon du gyurd pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor
88a1('bum): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can lam ngan par zhugs
88a2('bum): la tshul ma yin pa bzhi la zhe nad pa rnams la sems can rnam par dag par bya ba'i don tu mya ngan dang gnod pa las yang dag par bzla ba sdug bsngal dang yid myi bde ba nub par bya ba dang / rigs pa
88a3('bum): dang ldan pa'i chos go bar bya ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa mngon tu bya ba'i phyir gcig la rten pa'i lam stond te/ rab 'byor dade de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed
88a4('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa ra sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams kyi ded dpon tu gyur pa yin no// rab 'byor da ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
88a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'ibyang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams kyi yongs su 'dren par gyur pa yin zhe na/
88a6('bum): rab 'byor da 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ gzugs skye ba myed pa dang / 'gan
88a7('bum): pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'i phyir chos ston to// tshor ba skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed
88a8('bum): pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'i phyir chos stond to/ 'du shes skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'i phyir
88b1('bum): chos stond to// 'du byed skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'i phyir chos stond to// rnam par shes pa skye ba
88b2('bum): myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'i phyir chos stond to// myig skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang
88b3('bum): kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'i phyir chos stond to// rna ba skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par
88b4('bum): byang ba myed pa'i phyir chos stond to// snga skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa skye dad pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'i phyir chos stonang //

88b6('bum): 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'i phyir chos ston to// yid skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed
88b7('bum): pa dang rnam par byang ba myed pa'i phyir chos ston to// gzugs skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'i phyir chos
88b8('bum): ston to// sgra skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myeng ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par bya ba myed pa'i phyir chos ston to// dri skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed
89a1('bum): dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'i phyir chos stond to// ro skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang /
89a2('bum): rnam par byang ba myed pa'i phyir chos stond to// reg skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'i phyir chos stond to// chos skye ba
89a3('bum): myed pa dnga'agag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'i phyir chos stond to// myig gi rnam par shes pa skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang
89a4('bum): kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'i phyir chos stond to// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa skye ba myed pa da dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa
89a5('bum): dang rnam par byang ba myed pa'i phyir chos stond to// sna'i rnam par shes pa skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa
89a6('bum): phyir chos stond to// lce'i rnam par shes pa skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'i phyir chos ston to// lus kyi rnam par shes pa/
89a7('bum): skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'i phyir chos ston to// yid kyi rnam par shes pa skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa
89a8('bum): myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'i phyir chos stond to// myig gi 'dus te reg pa skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed
89b1('bum): pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'i phyir chos ston to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'i phyir chos ston
89b2('bum): to/ snga'i 'dus te reg pa skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rngam par byang ba myed pa'i phyir chos stonang to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa skye ba myed pa dang
89b3('bum): 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'i phyir chos stond to/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs
89b4('bum): pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'i phyir chos stonang to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang
89b5('bum): bamyed pa'i phyir chos stonang // myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed
89b6('bum): pa'i phyir chos ston to/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'i phyir chos stond to//
89b7('bum): sna'i 'jus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis pas tshor ba skye ba myed pa dang 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'i phyir chos stonang po/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
89b8('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba skye ba myed pa dang 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon pa mongs pa myed pa dang rnam par byang ba myed pa'i phyir chos stonang to/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba skye ba myed pa
90a1('bum): dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'i phyir chos stond to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba skye ba myed pa dang
90a2('bum): 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'i phyir chos stond to// sa'i khams skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs

90a4('bum): ston to mye'i khams skye ba myed pa dang 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'i phyir chos ston to/ rlung gi khams skye

90a6('bum): pa myed pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'i phyir chos stonang to// rnam par shes pa'i khams skye ba myed pa dang 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs
90a7('bum): pa myed pa dang rnam par byang ba myed pa'i phyir chos stonang to// ma rig pa skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon nas mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'i

90b6('bum): pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'i phyir chos ston to// srid pa skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'i phyir
90b7('bum): chos stond to// skye ba skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'i phyir chos ston to// rga shi skye ba myed pa dang 'gag pa
90b8('bum): myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par bya ba myed pa'i phyir chos stond to// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang
91a1('bum): kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i myed pa'i phyir chos stond to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang /
