122a8('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shi nang tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i goH
122b1('bum): yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//
122b2('bum): bam po brgyad pa'o// // rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ko ca de ni dran pa nye bar
122b3('bum): gzhag pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang shi nang du myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go tsa yang myed pas/ de'i phyir ko ca
122b4('bum): ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// / rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'i ko ca de ni yang dag par spong ba dang 'brel pa ma yin
122b5('bum): te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de yang dag par spro ba rnams kyang shi nad tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpo'i go tsa yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go ca de ni yang
122b6('bum): dag par spong ba dang 'breld pa ma si zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ko tsa de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang 'brelang pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
122b7('bum): rab 'byor du 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams kyang nin tu myed byang chub sems dpa'i goca sa myed pas/ phyir gi ci don rje 'phrul kyi rkang pa dang 'bres dus ma med zhes bya'o//
122b8('bum): rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go tsa de ni dbang po dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga dbang po rnams kyang ga nang tu myed la/ byang chub
123a1('bum): sems dpa'i go rtsa yang myed pas/ de'i phyir ko tsa de ni dbang po dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i groH
123a2('bum): ni stobs dang 'breld pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da stobs rnams kyang shi nad tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go tsa yang myed pas/ de 'i phyir go tsa de ni stobs
123a3('bum): dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pog ci de ni byang chub kyi yan lag dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
123a4('bum): 'byor nga byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang sha nang tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i ko tsa yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go/ ca de ni byang chub kyi yan lag dang 'breld pa ma yin zhes
123a5('bum): bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ko ca do ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgya da pa dang 'bral pa yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
123a6('bum): 'byor da 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang shi nang tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i gro ca yang myed pas/ de'i phyir ko tsa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang
123a7('bum): 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor ngad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'igo ca de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ra
123a8('bum): 'byor da 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang shi nad tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go ca yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go ca de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes
123b1('bum): bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ko tsa de ni bsam gtan dang 'brel dra ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga bsam katan ma kyang shind du
123b2('bum): skyed la byang chub sems dpa'i go tsa yang myed pas/ de'i phyir ko ca de ni bsam gtan dang 'breld pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
123b3('bum): ko tsa de ni tshad myed pa dang 'breld pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga tshad myed pa rnams kyang shi nad tu myang la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go tsa yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go
123b4('bum): de ni tshad myed pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ko ca de ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang
123b5('bum): 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'a byor da gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang shind du myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i ko tsa yang
123b6('bum): myed pas/ de'i phyir ko tsa de ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dnga' brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la go tsa de ni rnam par
123b7('bum): ba rang ba brgyad dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyang shi nang tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir koH
123b8('bum): ni rnam par thard pa brgyad dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go ca de ni mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
124a1('bum): dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang shi nang tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i koH
124a2('bum): yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go ca de ni mthar da kyis gnas par 'jug pa dgu dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go ca de ni rna
124a3('bum): par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
124a4('bum): ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yang shi nad du myed la byang chub sems dpa'i ko tsa yang myed pas de'i phyir go ca de ni rnam par tha radwa pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
124a5('bum): myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po'i ko ca de ni mngon par shes pa dang 'brel
124a6('bum): pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga mngon par shes pa rnams kyang shind du myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir ko ca de ni mngon par shes pa dang 'brel
124a7('bum): pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ko tsa de ni ting nge 'dzind dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da ting nge 'dzind dzas
124a8('bum): kyang shind du myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go ca yang myed pas de'i phyir go tsa de ni ting nge 'dzind dang 'bre lad pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
124b1('bum): chem po go tsa de ni gzungs kyi sgo dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dgazungs kyi sgo rnams kyang shin du myed la/ byang chub sems dbu'i gom yang skyed pas
124b2('bum): de'i phyir go ca de ni gzungs kyi sgo dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ko ca de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang 'brel dra pa ma
124b3('bum): yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang shin tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go tsa yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go ca de ni de bzhin gshegs
124b4('bum): pa'i stobs dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ko \u0f7fde ni myi 'jigs pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir/
124b5('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor da myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang shinang tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go tsa yang myed pas de'i phyir go ca de ni myi 'jigs pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes
124b6('bum): bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go ca de ni so so yang dag par rig pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga so so yang dag par
124b7('bum): rig pa rnams kyang sha nad tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go ca yang myed pas/ de'i phyir ko ca de ni so so yang dag par rig pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor
124b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go ca de ni byams pa chen po dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga byams pa chen po yang shi nang du myed la/ byang
125a1('bum): chub sems dpa'i ko tsa yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go ca de ni byams pa chen po dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
125a2('bum): ko tsa de ni snying rje chen po dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da snying rje chen po yang sha nad tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go tsa yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go ca de
125a3('bum): ni snying rje chen po dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go ca de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i
125a4('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dre ngas pa rnams kyang sha nad du myed la/ byang chub sems dang / 'i go tsa yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go ca de ni sangs rgyas
125a5('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i// go ca de ni rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa
125a6('bum): ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang shi nang du myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i ko tsa yang myed pas/ de'i phyir ko ca de ni rgyu nad tu zhugs
125a7('bum): pa'i 'bras bu dang 'breld pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ko ca de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel dra pa ma yin te/
125a8('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gang shi nad tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i ko tsa yang myed pas/ de'i phyir ko ca de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
125b1('bum): 'bras bu dang 'breld pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ko ca de ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na
125b2('bum): rab 'byor da phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang shi nang du myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go tsa yang myed pas/ de'i phyir ko ca de ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// /
125b3('bum): rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ko ca de ni dgra bcom pa nyid dang 'brel dra pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de dgra bcom pa nyid kyang shinang tu myed
125b4('bum): la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go tsa yang myed pas de'i phyir go tsa de ni dgra bcom pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma na zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa'
125b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i go ca de ni rang byang chub dang 'brel da pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byord rang byang chub kyang shi nad tu myed la/ byang chub sems
125b6('bum): dpa'i go tsa yang myed pas de'i phyir go tsa de ni rang byang chub dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go ca de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes
125b7('bum): pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang shinang tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i ko tsa yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go
125b8('bum): de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go ca de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang
126a1('bum): 'brel du pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang shinang tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir ko tsa
126a2('bum): ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa ka
126a3('bum): dag kyis sems can thams cad bdag cag gis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go ca bgos pa de dag gi go tsa ni chos thams cad dang 'brel pa ma yin no// gsol pa
126a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po'i sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las pazla bar bya'o zhes go ca 'tshal pa des nyan thos kyi sa
126a5('bum): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su dogs pa ra myi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cal
126a6('bum): 'tshal pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba'i gnas dang skabs ma mchis te/ de ni gnas dang skabs ma
126a7('bum): mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa mtsham so bcad de sems can kyi don du ko ca 'tshal pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'ad
126a8('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da khyod kyis dond kyi dbang gang zhig mthong na/ de skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go ca bgos shing / shes rab kyi
126b1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa des nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su dogs par myi bya'o zhes spras// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
126b2('bum): de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can nyi ce nyung zad cig gi slad du ko rtsa 'tshal pa ma lags// ye shes cung zad nyi ci zhig gi slad du go 'tshal pa ma las/
126b3('bum): de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'a'i sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i slad du go tsa 'tshal to//
126b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes kyi slad du 'o/ ca 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
126b5('bum): sprul pa rab 'byor da de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ ni sems can cung zad nyi rtse'i don tu go ca bgos pa ma
126b6('bum): yin ye shes cung zud nyi ci'i don tu ko tsa bgos pa ma yin gyi/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang /
126b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi donang du go ca bgos so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni shi nad tu zab pa ste/ de ni sus kyang bsgo
126b8('bum): bar myi bgyi ci yang bsgom par myi bkyi gang du yang bsgom par myi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la
127a1('bum): gang bsgom pa 'am/ kang bsgom par bgyi ba 'am/ gang gis bsgom par bgyi ba'i chos gang yang yongs su grub pa dmyigs su ma mchis ste/ bcom ldan 'das shes/
127a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa de ni nam mkha'i bsgom pa'o// !/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa de ni chos thams cad bsgom pa'o//
127a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa de ni mi mchis pa bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa
127a4('bum): bsgom pa de ni yongs su 'dzind pa ma mchis pa bsgom pa'o/ nga // bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa bsgom pa de ni bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
127a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa rab 'byord de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa de gangabasgom pa rnam par bsgom pa yin/ gsold pa/
127a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
127a7('bum): tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'du shes bsgom pa rnam par
127a8('bum): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
127b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni myig
127b2('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa bsgom pa 'di ni rna ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
127b3('bum): ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni sna bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni lce
127b4('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol pa tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di mi lus bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom
127b5('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni yid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
127b6('bum): tu phyi nad pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni smra bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa
127b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni dri bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
127b8('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni ro bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa bsgom pa 'di ni reg bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
128a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni chos bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
128a2('bum): rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni myig gi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rna ba'i rna bar/
128a3('bum): shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni sna'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom
128a4('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lce'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam pa dar bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
128a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa bsgom pa 'di ni lus kyi rna ma par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu/
128a6('bum): phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom ba rnam par bsgom po'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni myig gi
128a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
128a8('bum): ba'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste
128b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di
128b2('bum): ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'dre ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa 'ang na yang
128b3('bum): kya 'dus te raka pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsgo
128b4('bum): ba rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rna ba'i 'a dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsku
128b5('bum): ba'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'i sna'i 'dus te re ga pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
128b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
128b7('bum): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
128b8('bum): rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa
129a1('bum): gnos pa 'dus su mas bcom ldan ma par 'dom // co 'dis la/ shes rab rgyal rol tu phyid da pa bsgom pa 'di ma chu'i khams
129a2('bum): ba rnam par bri sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di ste ste/ shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sde'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di/
129a3('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rlung gi khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgo
129a4('bum): pa 'di ni nam mkha'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom po// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i khams
129a5('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'adi ni ma rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/
129a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
129a7('bum): phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni mying dang gzugs bsgom
129a8('bum): ba rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni skye mched drug bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'a
129b1('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor/
129b2('bum): ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni sred pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste
129b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni len pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni srid pa
129b4('bum): ba rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni skye ba bsgom ba rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
129b5('bum): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rga shi bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'ad/ pa 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsku
129b6('bum): ba 'di ni bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom lda na 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom po 'di ni sems can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// @
129b7('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di mo srog bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
129b8('bum): pa 'di ni 'gro ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni gsol ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom
130a1('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni skyes bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
130a2('bum): tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni keng zag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni shed can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
130a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni shed bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
130a4('bum): phyi nad pa bsgom pa 'di ni byed pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgo ma pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba po bsgom pa rnam
130a5('bum): par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni shes pa pobasgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di
130a6('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni mthong ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni
130a7('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom
130a8('bum): ba rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan
130b1('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyind pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
130b2('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyind pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di
130b3('bum): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa bsgo ba 'di ni nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
130b4('bum): ba'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid bsgom rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
130b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom lda na 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
130b6('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid bsgom
130b7('bum): brnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
130b8('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
131a1('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa bsgom pa 'di ni mtha' las
131a2('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par
131a3('bum): bsgom pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa bsgom pa 'di ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bco ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
131a4('bum): rko pa 'di ring bzhi spong pa nyid batho' na ba sgo 'i so ldan 'das 'di te/ shes rab kyis rol tu byin pa bsgo ba don thom mas car stong pa nyid mo/ gan par 'gro 'am/ tsa ma di ye shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyin
131a5('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni myal
131a6('bum): dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par
131a7('bum): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
131a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
131b1('bum): phyi nad pa bsgom pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni yang dag par spong /
131b2('bum): ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pabasgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom
131b3('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni dbang po bcom garnam tham bcom pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das 'dris ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
131b4('bum): phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni stobs bsgom pa rnam par bsgo dam pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni byang chub kyi yan
131b5('bum): lag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgo ma pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom
131b6('bum): ba rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
131b7('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni bsam gtan bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di la ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa bsgo
131b8('bum): ba 'di ni tshad myed pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom
132a1('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di nirnam par tha rad pa brgyad bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ @
132a2('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
132a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di
132a4('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni mngon par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// com ldan 'das 'di lte ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
132a5('bum): byind pa bsgom pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzind bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzungs kyi
132a6('bum): sgo bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// @
132a7('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni myi 'jigs pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa bsgo/
132a8('bum): ba 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni byams pa chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgo/
132b1('bum): bya'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni snying rje chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
132b2('bum): phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i
132b3('bum): 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni len cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
132b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta steshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom dab rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste
132b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni dgra bco ma pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
132b6('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni rang byang chub bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par
132b7('bum): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'dra
132b8('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin no 'di mi gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// ra
133a1('bum): 'byor du 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/
133a2('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'du shes bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab
133a3('bum): 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin
133a4('bum): pa bsgom pa 'drin myig bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang dpabasgom pa 'di ni rna ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
133a5('bum): rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phye nad pa bsgom pa 'di ni sna bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
133a6('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di na lci bsgom rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni lus bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor
133a7('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni yid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'din
133a8('bum): gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni smra bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/
133b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni dri bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni ro bsgom pa rnam par bsgo
133b2('bum): ba'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni reg bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
133b3('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni chos bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa bsgom pa 'di ni myig gi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
133b4('bum): ba'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nad pa bsgom pa 'di ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bsgo ma pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste
133b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni sna'i rna ma par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind
133b6('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni lce'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom/
133b7('bum): brnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'a
133b8('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgo
134a1('bum): ba 'di ni rno ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom
134a2('bum): ba rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes
134a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di na yid kyi 'dus
134a4('bum): te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba
134a5('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom po
134a6('bum): rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
134a7('bum): rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni lus kyi
134a8('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba
134b1('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni sa'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes
134b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa bsgom pa 'di ni chu'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni mye'i khams bsgom pa rnam
134b3('bum): par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rlung gi khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
134b4('bum): tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni nam mkha'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par
134b5('bum): shes pa'i khams bsgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa/ bsgom pa 'di ni rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
134b6('bum): rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
134b7('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni mying dang gzugs bsgom pa rnam par
134b8('bum): bsgom bya'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni skye mched drug bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
135a1('bum): rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba bsgom pa
135a2('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab nga 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni sred pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab
135a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni len pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni sred pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
135a4('bum): ba'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol da/ tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni skye ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgo ma pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
135a5('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rga shi bsgom pa rnam pa rabasgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni bdag bsgo
135a6('bum): ba rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni sems can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes
135a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa bsgom pa 'di na srog bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'gro ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgo
135a8('bum): ba'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni gsol bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
135b1('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni skyes bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni gang zag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor/
135b2('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni shed can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni shing
135b3('bum): bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni byed pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/
135b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni shes
135b5('bum): pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni mthong ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
135b6('bum): rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
135b7('bum): chu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni bzod pa'i
135b8('bum): rol du phyind pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgo
136a1('bum): pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta
136a2('bum): steshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
136a3('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom po/
136a4('bum): rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi dard pa bsgom pa 'di ni phyi ning stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam parabasgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
136a5('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni
136a6('bum): chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab
136a7('bum): 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
136a8('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor pa 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgo/
136b1('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor
136b2('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa
136b3('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam
136b4('bum): par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyad stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor
136b5('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom ba'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
136b6('bum): tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom
136b7('bum): brnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa bsgom pa 'di ni dngos po rgyad rnaman sa shrI bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste
136b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyi nad pa bsgom pa 'di ni yang
137a1('bum): dag par spong ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
137a2('bum): rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni dbang po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di
137a3('bum): ni stobs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di
137a4('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab
137a5('bum): kyi pha rol du phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa
137a6('bum): 'di ni bsam gtan bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni ched myed pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor
137a7('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
137a8('bum): phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par tha rad pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
137b1('bum): 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang
137b2('bum): smond pa myed pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni mngon par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// ra
137b3('bum): 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzinang bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa
137b4('bum): 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsgom
137b5('bum): ba rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni myi 'jigs pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor
137b6('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgo
137b7('bum): ba 'di ni byams pa chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni snying rje chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/
137b8('bum): rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
138a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'din rkyen du zhugs pa'i 'bras cu bsgom lda rnam par brkos 'a'o/ rab 'byor nga 'di lta/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bcom
138a2('bum): 'di ni len cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rna bar
138a3('bum): bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di na dgra bcom pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
138a4('bum): rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rang byang chub bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni lam gyi rnam pa
138a5('bum): shes pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byo/ rang 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa bsgo/ ma pa 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid bsgom pa rna
138a6('bum): par bsgom pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
138a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs
138a8('bum): su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
138b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon par chags pa myed
138b2('bum): dam zhes brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol
138b3('bum): tu phyi nad pa la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' seMs
138b4('bum): dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la mngon pa/ ra chags pa myed dam zhes tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su
138b5('bum): brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon bar chags pa myed dam zhes sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa
138b6('bum): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes nang
138b7('bum): stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes
138b8('bum): phyi stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed
139a1('bum): dam zhes phyi nang stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
139a2('bum): la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po chen po stong
139a3('bum): pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes chen po stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
139a4('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes don dam pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 'a chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor da byang
139a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes 'dus byas stong / pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod
139a6('bum): su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpal
139a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myang ngam zhes mtha' las 'das pa
139a8('bum): stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la mngon par
139b1('bum): chags pa myed dram zhes thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
139b2('bum): dor ba gyed pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes/ dor bskyed pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpam
139b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor
139b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes chos thams cad stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems
139b5('bum): dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes rang
139b6('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon
139b7('bum): bur chags pa myed dam zhes gyi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
139b8('bum): chen po dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myang ngam zhes dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor/
140a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
140a2('bum): yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
140a3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon
140a4('bum): bar chags pa myed dam zhes/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam sa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa'
140a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po yang dag par spong ba rnams la mngon bar chags pa myed dam zhes yang dag par spong ba rna/ mas la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
140a6('bum): yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
140a7('bum): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes
140a8('bum): dbang po rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs rnams la mngon par chags pa
140b1('bum): myed dam zhes stobs rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi yan lag/
140b2('bum): rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dang
140b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
140b4('bum): yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sa mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i bden parnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes
140b5('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bas
140b6('bum): gtan rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes bsam gtan rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems
140b7('bum): dpa' chen po chang byed pa rnams la mngon par chags pa byed dam zhes/ chad byed pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub
140b8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la byang chub sems
141a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par tha rad pa rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes/
141a2('bum): rnam par tha rad pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
141a3('bum): 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes/ mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor
141a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa mye da pa la mngon par chags par myed dam zhes rnam par thar
141a5('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod/ sa su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems
141a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par tshogs pa myed dam zhes/ mngon par shes pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//
141a7('bum): rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzind rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes/ ting nge 'dzind rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod/
141a8('bum): su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes gzungs kyi sgo rnams la byang chub sems dpal/
141b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes/ de bzhi
141b2('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya 'jigs pa rnams la mngon par
141b3('bum): chags pa myed dam zhes/ myi 'jigs pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po so so yang dag
141b4('bum): par rig pa rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' se/ mas dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor
141b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa chen po la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes/ byams pa chen po la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs
141b6('bum): su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes/ snying rje chen po la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
141b7('bum): yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
141b8('bum): pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad shes pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes
142a1('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la
142a2('bum): mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa
142a3('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// /
142a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pabam po dgu pa'o// / phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
142a5('bum): chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i che/ pha rol gyi ste smras pa dang / pha rol kyis bstand pa la snying por myi lta 'am/ phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems
142a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol kyi dad pas myi 'gro 'am/ phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes
142a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam
142b1('bum): gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/ phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe//
142b2('bum): sbyin bu'i ba rod tu phyin pa dang bral bangs rgyar dad tam tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang thal bar ma gyur tam bzod pa'i pha rolang tu phyind pa dang thal bar ma gyurang tam bcom 'gyus
142b3('bum): kyi pha rol du phyind pa dang bral bar ma gyu rad tam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bral bar ma gyurd tam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa dang bral bar ma gyurd tam// zhes yo
142b4('bum): su brtag par bya ste/ gal te phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa'i tshe/ myi 'jigs myi sdang /
142b5('bum): skrag par myi 'gyur la/ zhum pa dang yongs su zhum paramyi 'gyur zhing / de'i yid phyir rung bar myi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di zos par dgra'
142b6('bum): thos nas kyang 'dzind cing 'chang la klog cing kun chub par byed de/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed la/ de bzhin du nan tam du byed na/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po ngas
142b7('bum): mi sngon gyi mtham yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di yongs su dras shing / yongs su brtag pa byas pa dang / bzung zhing bcangs te/ kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la
142b8('bum): byas par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa'i che/ myi 'jim
143a1('bum): myi sdang / skrag par myi 'gyur la/ zhum par myi 'gyur/ yongs su zhum par myi 'gyur zhing / de'i yid phyir myi ldog la thos nas kyang gong du 'dzind cing 'chang la/ klog cing kun chub
143a2('bum): par byed de/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/
143a3('bum): myi 'jigs/ myi sdang / skrag par myi 'gyur zhing / zhum par myi 'gyur/ yongs su zhum par myi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ shes rab kyi
143a4('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di ji ltar brtag par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor nga bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ rnam pa thos
143a5('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di brtag par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ rnam pa
143a6('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rtog pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra
143a7('bum): stsal dpa/ rab 'byor de stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor
143a8('bum): mtshan ma myed pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin// rab 'byor nga smond pa myed pa la gzhol
143b1('bum): ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin// rab 'byor nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems
143b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor nga skye ba myed pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
143b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor nga 'gag pa myed pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
143b4('bum): zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin// rab 'byor de kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha
143b5('bum): rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byorang rnam par byang ba myed pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab rgya
143b6('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor da de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la
143b7('bum): rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor de chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin
143b8('bum): rab 'byor de yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor
144a1('bum): mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor bsam
144a2('bum): gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor de mngon par 'du
144a3('bum): bya ba myed pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor da rmyi lam la gzhol ba'i bas
144a4('bum): bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor nga gzugs brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas
144a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ ra'abyor nga sgra brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang
144a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor nga smig rgya la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpan
144a7('bum): chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor nga sgyu ma la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
144a8('bum): na byi na pa zab mo 'dil rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor da sprulang pa la gzhol ba'i bams pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'ang
144b1('bum): la rtog pa yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa
144b2('bum): zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ mtshan ma myed pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog par
144b3('bum): 'gyur/ smond pa myed pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur// nam
144b4('bum): mkha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu/ phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ skye ba ma
144b5('bum): mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sem sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur 'gag pa'am
144b6('bum): mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam
144b7('bum): par byang ba ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la chog par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid la gzhol
144b8('bum): ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang
145a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dang
145a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha
145a3('bum): rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo
145a4('bum): 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo
145a5('bum): 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ rmyi lam la gzhol ba'i bsam/ bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur
145a6('bum): gzugs brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ sgra brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam
145a7('bum): bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ smyig rgyu la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
145a8('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ sgyu ma la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol
145b1('bum): tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog par
145b2('bum): 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/ tshor ba la rtog pa lags kas/ 'du shes la rtog pa lags/
145b3('bum): byed la rtog pa lags las/ rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam// myig la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sA la rtog pa lags nas/ spe la rtog pa lags
145b4('bum): sam/ lus la rtog pa lags sam/ yid la rtog pa/ lags sam// gzugs la rtog pa lags sam sba la rtog pa lags sam/ dra la rtog pa lags sam
145b5('bum): rol rtog pa lags sam/ reg la rtog pa lags sam/ chos la rtog pa lags sam// myig gi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rtog/
145b6('bum): pA lags sam/ snga'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lugs sum/ lce'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ yid kyi rnam par
145b7('bum): shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ myig gi 'dus te pA la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ skye'i
145b8('bum): 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba
146a1('bum): la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ lce'i 'dus
146a2('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags so/
146a3('bum): sa'i khams la rtog pa lags sam chu'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ mye'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ rlung gi khams la rtog pa lags sam/ nam mkha'i khams la rtog pa
146a4('bum): lags sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la rtog pa lag sa sam// ma rig pa la rtog pa lags sam/ 'du byed la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa la rtog
146a5('bum): pa lags sam/ mying dang gzugs la rtog pa lags sam skye mched drug la rtog pa lags sam/ reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sred
146a6('bum): pa la rtog pa lags sam le nad pa la rtog pa lags sam/ srid pa la rtog pa lags sam/ skye ba la rtog pa lags sam/ rga shi la rtog pa lags sam// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
146a7('bum): pa la rtog pa lags sam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rtog pa lags sam/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyind pa la rtog pa lags sam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rtog pa
146a8('bum): lags sam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rtog pa lags sam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rtog pa lags sam/ nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ phyi
146b1('bum): stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ chen po stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ don dam pa stong
146b2('bum): pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam
146b3('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rtog
146b4('bum): pa lags sam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam
146b5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dngos po myi da pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam
146b6('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rdzu 'phrul bya rkang pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ dbang po rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ stobs rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ byang
146b7('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rtog pa lags so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ bsam gtan rnams la rtog
146b8('bum): pa lags sam/ tshad myed pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/
147a1('bum): mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la rtog pa lags
147a2('bum): sam mngon par shes pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ ting nge 'dzind rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
147a3('bum): rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ byams pa chen po la rtog pa lags sam/ snying rje
147a4('bum): chen po la rtog pa lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dre sa pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ thams cad shes pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes
147a5('bum): pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad many+dzu nad pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga byang chub seMs
147a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no// tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// 'du shes la rtog pa ma yin no// 'du byed la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam par shes pa la rtog
147a7('bum): pa ma yin no// myig la rtog pa ma yin no// rna ba la rtog pa ma yin no// sna la rtog pa ma yin no// lce la rtog pa ma yin no// lus la rtog pa ma yin no// yid la rtog pa ma yin no// /
147a8('bum): gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no// sgra la rtog pa ma yin no// dri la rtog pa ma yin no// ro la rtog pa ma yin no// reg la rtog pa ma yin no// chos la rtog pa ma yin no// myig gi rnam par
147b1('bum): shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// sna'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// lce'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// lus kyi rnam par shes pa
147b2('bum): la rtog pa ma yin no// yid kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// myig gi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa la
147b3('bum): rtog pa ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend
147b4('bum): kyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg parkyend kyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg/ pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// lce'i 'dus
147b5('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma
147b6('bum): yin no// sa'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no// chu'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no// mye'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no// rlung gi khams la rtog pa mo yin no// nam mkha'i khams la rtog/
147b7('bum): pa ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no// ma rig pa la rtog pa ma yin no// 'du byed la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// mying dang gzug
147b8('bum): la rtog pa ma yin no// skye mched drug la rtog pa ma yin no// reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// sred pa la rtog pa ma yin no// lend pa la rtog pa ma yin no//
148a1('bum): srid pa la rtog pa ma yin no// skye ba la rtog pa ma yin no// rga shi la rtog pa ma yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la rtog pa ma yin no// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin
148a2('bum): pa la rtog pa ma yin no// bzod pa'i pha rol du phyind pa la rtog pa ma yin no// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rtog pa ma yin no// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rtog pa
148a3('bum): ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rtog pa ma yin no// nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// phyi stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// phyi nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no//
148a4('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// chen po ste// dang pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// don dam pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa
148a5('bum): ma yin no// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma
148a6('bum): yin no// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la
148a7('bum): rtog pa ma yin no// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// dngos po myed pa'i
148a8('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// yang dag par spong ba rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la
148b1('bum): rtog pa ma yin no// dbang po rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// stobs rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rtog/

148b3('bum): pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam par tha rad pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa
148b4('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la rtog pa ma yin no// mngon par shes pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// ting nge 'dzind rnams la rtog pa ma yin no//

148b6('bum): dag par rig pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// byams pa chen po la rtog pa ma yin no// snying rje chen po la rtog pa ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no//
148b7('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// nas pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhen
148b8('bum): rab 'byor da de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sus kyang ma byas rnam par ma byas/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs gang du yang ma song phyogs na yang myi gnas
149a1('bum): yul na yang myi gnas/ ga na yang myi gnas pa ste/ de la grangs myi dmyigs so// 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba yang myi dmyigs so// gang la grangs myi dmyigs shing / 'gro/
149a2('bum): ba dang 'ong ba myi dmyigs pa de ni/ gang gis kyang mngon par 'tshang rgya bar myi nus te// gzugs kyis ma yin no// tshor bas ma yin no// 'du shes kyis ma yin no// 'du byed kyis mo yin no//
149a3('bum): rnam par shes pas ma yin no// myig gis ma yin no// rna bas ma yin no// snas ma yin no// lces ma yin no// lus kyis ma yin no// yid kyis ma yin no// gzugs kyis ma yin
149a4('bum): no/ sgras ma yin no// dris ma yin no// ros ma yin no/ reg gis ma yin no/ chos kyis ma yin no// myig gi rnam par shes pas ma yin no// rna ba'i rnam par shes
