149a7('bum): reg pas ma yin no/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pas ma yin no// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas ma yin no// sna'i
149a8('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor bas ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg

150a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis ma yin no//
150a2('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis ma yin no// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis ma yin no// dbang po rnams kyis ma yin no// stobs rnams kyis ma yin no// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis ma yin no//

150a4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis ma yin no// rnam par thard pa rnams kyis ma yin no// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyom rnas par 'jug pa dgus ma yin no// rnam par tha rad pa'i
150a5('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed/ pas ma yin no// mngon par shes pa rnams kyis ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis ma yin no// gzungs kyi sgo

150a7('bum): yin no// snying rje chen pos ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyud kyis ma yin no// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus ma yin no// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus ma yin/
150a8('bum): no/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus ma yin no// dgra bcom pa nyid kyis ma yin no// rang byang chub kyis ma yin no// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad la
150b1('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyis ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// 'du shes nyid kyang rnam pa

150b3('bum): pa nyid do// rna ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// sna nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// lce nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// lus nyid kyang rnam pa thos

151b2('bum): kya rnam pa thams cad sa pa tu nyid depa nyid pa sa pa mkhyed pad da pa da kya nas byamams cad sa byed pa nyid/

152a4('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyangarnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// dngos po myed pa 'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend
152a5('bum): pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyend pa nyid do// yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// rdzu 'phrul gyi
152a6('bum): rkang pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// dbang po nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// stobs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// byang chub kyi yan lag
152a7('bum): nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad

152b1('bum): nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// rnam par tha rad pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad
152b2('bum): mkhyend pa nyid do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// mngon par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa zas
152b3('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid do// ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang rnam
152b4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// myi 'jigs pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// so so yang dag/ par rig pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do/

152b6('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
152b7('bum): gcig pa'o// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig blo/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
152b8('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/
153a1('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// myig/
153a2('bum): gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rna ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
153a3('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sna'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/
153a4('bum): lce'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhi na nyid gcig pa'o// lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang
153a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// yid kyi de bzhin nyi da gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
153a6('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid
153a7('bum): gcig pa'o// sgra'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dri'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
153a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ro de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
153b1('bum): yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// reg gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// chos kyi de bzhi//
153b2('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ga yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
153b3('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
153b4('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid kacig pa'o// sna'i na ma par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/
153b5('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid
153b6('bum): gcig pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// yid kyi rnam
153b7('bum): par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang
153b8('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
154a1('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de
154a2('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni
154a3('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//
154a4('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin/ ba de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// myig gi 'dus te
154a5('bum): reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin/ ba de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus
154a6('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
154a7('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
154a8('bum): tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor
154b1('bum): ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de
154b2('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
154b3('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
154b4('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mye'i kham nas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin
154b5('bum): nyid gcig pa'o// rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// nam
154b6('bum): mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang /
154b7('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang srin bu dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa

155a2('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad

155a7('bum): gcig pa'o// skye ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rga shi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /

155b3('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de
155b4('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang ba de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid gang
155b5('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
155b6('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kar yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
155b7('bum): yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//
155b8('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin
156a1('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang

156a5('bum): gcig pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de ba zhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nye dkyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid kacig/
156a6('bum): pa'o// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi rdzo pa ni ba de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
156a7('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
156a8('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhi
156b1('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin
156b2('bum): nyid gcig pa'o// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa
156b3('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
156b4('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de bzhin nyid ga yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gapa yin
156b5('bum): ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhi na nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
156b6('bum): dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
156b7('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid klang
156b8('bum): yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig po/
157a1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam
157a2('bum): yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang
157a3('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend
157a4('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid ka/ cig pa'o// tshad myed pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa/ dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
157a5('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ga/ nga yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de
157a6('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin
157a7('bum): nyid gcig pa'o// mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//
157a8('bum): rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin
157b1('bum): nyid gcig pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi
157b2('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen de pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// gzungs kyi go rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams can
157b3('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin
157b4('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnamadapa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/
157b5('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa na/ mas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams da mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/
157b6('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid kAng yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// snying rje chen po'i de
157b7('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhye rad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
157b8('bum): rna ba thas cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u sum cu brgyad do// /
158a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu pa'o// // de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod
158a2('bum): bya'i lha'i bu rnams lha rdzas kyi can dan gyi phye ma dang / lhums kyi mye tog ud pa la dang / pad mo dang / ku mu ta dang / pun 'da' ri ka mang po khyer da te// bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de
158a3('bum): logs su 'thor bar gyu rad te// gtor nas bcom ldan 'das ka la ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 'khod
158a4('bum): nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa 'i lha'i bu de dag kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces ka solang to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshes
158a5('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas na/ mas shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di las 'di skad du gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/
158a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
158a7('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid rnam
158a8('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// myig nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang myig go/
158b1('bum): pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang sna'o// lce nyid rnam
158b2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang lce'o// lus nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang lus so// yid nyid rnam pa thams
158b3('bum): cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang yid do// gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra nyid rnam pa thams
158b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang sgra'o// dri'i nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang dri'o// ro nyid rnam pa
158b5('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa nyid kyang ro'o// reg nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen dpaste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang reg go
158b6('bum): chos nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang chos so// myig gi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
158b7('bum): nyid kyang myig gi rnam par shes pa'o// ma ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnga ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// snga'i rnam par shes pa
158b8('bum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cadal
159a1('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes po/
159a2('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
159a3('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus
159a4('bum): te reg pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nya da kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa
159a5('bum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// phu sa kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
159a6('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang yid kyil
159a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
159a8('bum): tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o//
159b1('bum): snga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg
159b2('bum): ba'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
159b3('bum): tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid
159b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams
159b5('bum): cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang sal khams so// chu'i khams nyid rnam pa mas cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
159b6('bum): pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so// mye'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang mye'i khams so/ rlung gi khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
159b7('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// nam mkha' khams ldid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i lam so//
159b8('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// ma rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyer
160a1('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// na bar
160a2('bum): shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mying dang gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
160a3('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyang mying dang gzug so// skye mched drug nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go/ reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad la
160a4('bum): mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sred
160a5('bum): pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang sred pa'o// lend pa nyid rnam pa tha mas cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
160a6('bum): nyid kyang lend pa'o// srid pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
160a7('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
160a8('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyimed pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
160b1('bum): kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// brtson
160b2('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid rnam pa
160b3('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa
160b4('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin da pa'o// nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang nang stong pa
160b5('bum): nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// phye nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/
160b6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ num pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po ba
160b7('bum): pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
160b8('bum): nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam/
161a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rna pa thams//
161a2('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong
161a3('bum): pa nyid do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
161a4('bum): mkhyen du pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa / da rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams
161a5('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong
161a6('bum): pa nyid do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad la
161a7('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid
161a8('bum): stong pa nyid do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar
161b1('bum): gzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa zas
161b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye rang pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// dbang po nya
161b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so/
161b4('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag mas so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam
161b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// pags pa'i bden pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
161b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden rnams so// bsam gtan nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// tshad myed/
161b7('bum): pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chad myed pa rnams so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams
161b8('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thard pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par tha rad pa rnams so//
162a1('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/
162a2('bum): rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
162a3('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'o// mngon par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// ting nge 'dzin nyid rnam pa
162a4('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ da pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzind rnams so// gzungs kyi sgo nyid/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
162a5('bum): pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
162a6('bum): rnams so// myi 'jigs pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang mya 'jigs pa rnams so// so so yang dag par rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/
162a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// byams pa chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o//
162a8('bum): snying rje chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam
162b1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de ba'i
162b2('bum): nyid gcig bste/ gnyis su byed cing gnyis su byar myed do// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa deni/ de bzhin nyid gcig sa
162b3('bum): ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
162b4('bum): su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// 'du byed kyi de bzhi na nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nye da kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa
162b5('bum): ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni
162b6('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byor myed do// myig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/
162b7('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ konyis su byed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rna ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig/
162b8('bum): pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// sna'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
163a1('bum): su myed cing gnyi su byar myed do// lce'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su
163a2('bum): myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis
163a3('bum): su byar myed do// yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// /
163a4('bum): gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bdan de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su
163a5('bum): byar myed do// sgra'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su
163a6('bum): byar myed do// dri'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do//
163a7('bum): ro'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// reg ka de bzhin
163a8('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang
163b1('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i de
163b2('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rna ba'i rnam par
163b3('bum): shes pa di bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// sA'i
163b4('bum): rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa / de bzhin nyid gcig pA ste/ gnyis su sred
163b5('bum): gnyis su byar myed do// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
163b6('bum): nyas su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa
163b7('bum): gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa
163b8('bum): ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
164a1('bum): gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin
164a2('bum): nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin
164a3('bum): nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// sde'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid
164a4('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de
164a5('bum): ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing ga nyis su byar myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin / ra gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de
164a6('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
164a7('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su sbed cing gnyi su byar myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang
164a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid
164b1('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba
164b2('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
164b3('bum): kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// yid kyi 'dus
164b4('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pade ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis
164b5('bum): su byar myed do// sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin/ ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed
164b6('bum): cing gnyis su byar myed do// chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing
164b7('bum): gnyis su byar myed do// mye'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su
164b8('bum): byar myed do// rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar
165a1('bum): myed do// nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing
165a2('bum): gnyis su byar myed do// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su
165a3('bum): myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing
165a4('bum): gnyis su byar myed do// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa/ dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ka/ nga yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed
165a5('bum): cing gnyis su byar myed do// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nya/ da gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi/ de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
165a6('bum): gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// mying dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
165a7('bum): su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed
165a8('bum): cing gnyis su byar myed do// reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su
165b1('bum): byar myed do// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// sred
165b2('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// lend pa'i de bzhin
165b3('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// srid pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa

165b5('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhi na nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ nyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rga shi'i de bzhin nyid
165b6('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin
165b7('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind
165b8('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu
166a1('bum): phyi nang pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do//
166a2('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su
166a3('bum): byar myed do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
166a4('bum): su myed cing gnyis su byar myed ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni
166a5('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su bya/ ra myed do// nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin padang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
166a6('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
166a7('bum): yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
166a8('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhi

166b5('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyi da gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa

167b7('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su sbed cing gnyis su byar myed do// bsam gtan rnams kyi
167b8('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// tshad myed pa rnams kyi de

168a2('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/

168a4('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de ba zhen nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis/
168a5('bum): su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rnam par tha rang ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyerapa
168a6('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa

168b4('bum): ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnye/ sa su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// byams pa chen po
168b5('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gaHka pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do//
168b6('bum): snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// sangs rgyas
168b7('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid grang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar byed do//
168b8('bum): rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/
169a1('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing
169a2('bum): gnyis su byar myed do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su
169a3('bum): myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing
169a4('bum): gnyis su byar myed do// rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid ka/ nga yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
169a5('bum): gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// lam gyi rna ma pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rna ma pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
169a6('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyi su byar myed do// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kang
169a7('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i dpa' de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin
169a8('bum): nyid bu de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
169b1('bum): de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// dgra bcom pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyidal
169b2('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rang sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de ni yi ba de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
169b3('bum): su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su
169b4('bum): myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
169b5('bum): gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// zhes stond pa ni 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub she sa rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di zab cing blta' dka' la
169b6('bum): khong du chud par dka' zhing brtag tu ma mchis la rtog ke'i spyod yul ma lags pa ste/ zhi zhing phra ba zhib mo mkhas shing rtogs pas rig par bgyi ba ste/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid chen
169b7('bum): par dka' ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal da to// lha'i bu dag re de bzhin no// de de
169b8('bum): bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa zhes
170a1('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/
170a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// myig nyid rnam pa thams
170a3('bum): cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang myig go// rna ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
170a4('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang sna'o// lce nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang snal/ su nyad rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
170a5('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang lce'o// lus nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang lus so// yid nyid rnam pa thams cad
170a6('bum): mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang yid do// gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra nyid rnam pa thams cad
170a7('bum): mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang sgra'o// dri nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang dri'o// ro nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/
170a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang ro'o// reg nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang reg go/ chos nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams
170b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos so// myig gi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang myig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid
170b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
170b3('bum): nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam
170b4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam parashes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa zas
170b5('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// myi ga gi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'o//
170b6('bum): rdza ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang na pa'i 'dus te reg pa'o// snga'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa/
170b7('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// sde'i 'alus te reg pa nyid na thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rna ba zas cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
170b8('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg
171a1('bum): pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o//
171a2('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen du pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// snga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
171a3('bum): kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad
171a4('bum): mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dras te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend
171a5('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang lus kyi/ 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te/ reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/
171a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams nyin pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so//
171a7('bum): chu'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so// rtse'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
171a8('bum): kyang mye'i khams so// rlung gi khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// nam mkha'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/
171b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so// rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so//
171b2('bum): ma rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang
171b3('bum): 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mying gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/
171b4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang mying dang gzugs so// skye mched drug nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rna/ ma pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go/ reg
171b5('bum): pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa zam sa cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
171b6('bum): nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sred pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang sred pa'o// lend pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
171b7('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyang le nad pa'o// srid pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa zas
171b8('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa/
172a1('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
172a2('bum): pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// brtson
172a3('bum): 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid rnam pa
172a4('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/
172a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang nang stong pa
172a6('bum): nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mu khye dad pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
172a7('bum): mkhye rad pa nyid kyang byi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen du pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid rnam
172a8('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kya
172b1('bum): xxx
172b2('bum): rnam pa sa 'dusakhye pa nyid kyang 'dum sa byas stong pa nyid do// mama'asus 'das bsong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad ma myen pa rtse/ rnam pa thams cad sa khye du pa nyid kyang ma
172b3('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid rnam
172b4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
172b5('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos tham sa cad stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do//
172b6('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang reg mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/
172b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thamasu cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid do/
172b8('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/
173a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang dran
173a2('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid rnam
173a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// dbang po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang dbang
173a4('bum): po rnams so// stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang stobs rnams/ so// byang chub kyi yan lag nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
173a5('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi ya na lag rnams so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
173a6('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so//
173a7('bum): bsam gtan nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// tshad myed pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
173a8('bum): kyang tshad myed pa rnams so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so//
173b1('bum): bar bar da pa nyid rnas thamams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnas pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par b.rang ba rnams so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa rtse
173b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
173b3('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par tha rang ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma byed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'o// mngon par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
173b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnam sa so// ting nge 'dzin nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzind rnams so//
173b5('bum): gzungs kyi sgo nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
173b6('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// myi 'jigs pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myi 'jigs pa rnams
173b7('bum): mo yang ngas par rig pa nyid rnam pa bams rgya ma khyen pa ste/ rnas pa thams cad pakhyen pa nyid kyang po mo yang dag par rig pa rnams so// byams pachen po rnam pa sems cadas sbyin pa /
173b8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o// snying rje chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid
174a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so//
174a2('bum): bam po bcu gcig pa'o// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin
174a3('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni re /
174a4('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byarabyed do// 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / dam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de
174a5('bum): ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis/ su byar myed do// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de
174a6('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su byed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam po thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/
174a7('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ kanyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// myig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa /
174a8('bum): gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rga ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su
174b1('bum): byar myed do// sna'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// lce'i de bzhin nyid gang /
174b2('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
174b3('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin

174b5('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// sgra'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin
174b6('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// dri'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin
174b7('bum): nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// ro'i de bzhin nyid kang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su
174b8('bum): myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// reg gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed
175a1('bum): chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// myig gi rnam par/

175a5('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de ba zhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi sa su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// lus kyi rnam par shes
175a6('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin
175a7('bum): TI gang len pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar skyed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyi gas
175a8('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
175b1('bum): dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /

175b7('bum): tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyer
175b8('bum): kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg
176a1('bum): pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do//
176a2('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar
176a3('bum): byed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis
176a4('bum): byar myed do// sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de/ ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis
176a5('bum): su byar myed do// chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing
176a6('bum): gnyis su byar myed do// mye'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed
176a7('bum): do// rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// nam mkha'
176a8('bum): khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rnam par shes pa'i khas/
176b1('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
176b2('bum): dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
176b3('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
176b4('bum): kyi de bzhi nyid gang sI ba de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// mying dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ka/ nga yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin
176b5('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi
176b6('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa/
176b7('bum): de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de
176b8('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// sred pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid
177a1('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// len pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig/
177a2('bum): pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// srid pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed
177a3('bum): cing gnyis su byar myed do// skye ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myedado//
177a4('bum): rga shi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad ma khyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid ka cig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// sbyin
177a5('bum): ba'i pha rol du phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang // rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis
177a6('bum): su byar myed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dri bzhin nyid gang yin pa de rI/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su mye
177a7('bum): cing gnyis su byar myed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed
177a8('bum): cing gnyis su byar myed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
177b1('bum): su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste

177b7('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyad gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de
177b8('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi del

181a1('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi//
181a2('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// lha'i bu dag don gyi dbang de gzigs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa phrin las chung bya la thugs
181a3('bum): gzhol te/ chos bstand pa la gzhol ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos byang chub 'di ni zab cing / blta dka' la khong du chud par dka' zhing
181a4('bum): brtag tu myed la rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin te/ zhi zhing phra bzhib mo mkhas shing rtogs pas rig par bya ba 'jig rten tham sa cad kyis yid ches par bka' ba ste/ de ni sus kyang
181a5('bum): mngon par sangs rgyas nam yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas/ nga yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas te/ gang la gnyis su kun nas rgyu ba myed pa de ni/ chos rnams kyi zab pa nyid do//
181a6('bum): lha'i bu dag nam mkha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag chos kyi dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag yang dag pa'i/
181a7('bum): mtha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di mabu bo/ lha'i bu dgu bsam myos kyi khyab pa'i dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di nub po/ lha'i bu dag mtha' yas su myed pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di thob po/ lha'i bungs
181a8('bum): 'ong ba dang 'gro ba myed pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag myi skye myi 'gag pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa myed ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag kun nas nyon
181b1('bum): mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa myed pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par/
181b2('bum): byang chub pa myed pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag bdag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag sems can zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag srog zab pa'i phyir chos
181b3('bum): 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag 'gro ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag gso' ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag skyes bu zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag gang zag
181b4('bum): zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ lha'i bu dag shed can zab pa 'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag shed bdag zab pa'i phyi der chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag byed pa po zab pa'i phyir
181b5('bum): chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag tshor ba po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag shes pa po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag mthong ba po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di
181b6('bum): zab bo// lha'i bu dag gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag 'du shes zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag 'du byed zab
181b7('bum): pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ lha'i bu dag rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag myig zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rna ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'ad zab bo
181b8('bum): lha'i bu dag sna zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag lce zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag lus zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag yid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// /
182a1('bum): lha'i bu dag gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag sgra zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag dri zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag ro zab pa'i phyir
182a2('bum): chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag reg zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag chos zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag myig gi rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu
182a3('bum): bu dag na ba'i rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lnga'i bu dag sna'i rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag sde'i rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// stsol
182a4('bum): bu dag lus kyi rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag yid kyi rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'odi za/ pa bo// lha'i bu dag myig gi 'dus te reg pa zab po'i
182a5('bum): phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa thab ba'i phyir chos 'di zab po/ lha'i bu dag sna'i 'dus tere ga pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag lde'i
182a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di thob bo// lha'i bu dag yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab zo// lha'i
182a7('bum): bu dgra myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ lha'i bu dgra rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ lha'i bu dag sde'i 'dus te reg
182a8('bum): pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
182b1('bum): tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'dri zab bo// lha'i bu dag yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag sa'i khams zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i/
