236a2('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid kyi dmyigs te/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ stong pa nyid stong
236a3('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la chen po stong pa nyid kyi dmyigs
236a4('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ chen po/ stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi de nga zhan nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la don dam pa
236a5('bum): stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhi na nyid myi dmyigs te/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyi/ gas na/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi bzhin nyid la dmyigs
236a6('bum): par ga la 'gyur/ de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi
236a7('bum): bzhin nyid ltar dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na
236a8('bum): 'dus ma byas stong lha dbyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ mtha' la
236b1('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ thog ma dang
236b2('bum): pa ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ thog ma dpapa ma skyed pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs ma/ tho bras dpa tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lha dmyigs par
236b3('bum): 'gyur/ de la dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ dor ba/
236b4('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rang
236b5('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rang bzhin stong panyid kyi de bzhin nyid ltar dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ chos thams
236b6('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi dri bzhin nyid lha dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la rang gi mtshan
236b7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs
236b8('bum): par ga la 'gyur/ de la myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ myi dmyigs pa stong
237a1('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang
237a2('bum): myi dmyigs na/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyi phyi ba'i sde dbyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyig
237a3('bum): na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/
237a4('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rtswa dmyigs na/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyig sa par ka la 'gyur// de la drun pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi
237a5('bum): dmyigs/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyig/ sa te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka
237a6('bum): la 'gyur/ de la yang dag par spong ba rnams myi dmyigs/ yang drag par spong ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta
237a7('bum): dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi dmyigs/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs ma/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi
237a8('bum): de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la dbang po rnams myi dmyigs/ dbang po'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ dbang po'i nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs
237b1('bum): ga la 'gyur/ de la stobs rnams myi dmyigs/ stobs kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ stobs nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la byang chub kyi yan lag/
237b2('bum): rnams myi dmyigs/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi de 'azhan nyid kyi dmyigs te/ byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur// de la/
237b3('bum): 'phags pa'i lam ldan lag brgyad pa 'i dmyigs/ 'phags pa'i sam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi dmyigs te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid krung myi dmyigs na/ 'phags pa'i lan
237b4('bum): yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyu ra// de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi dmyigasa'aphags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ 'phags
237b5('bum): pa'i bden pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ 'phags pa'i bden ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ltar ma dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la bsam gtan rnams myi dmyigs/ bsam gtan gyi de
237b6('bum): bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ bsam gtan nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la tshad myed pa rnams myi dmyigs/ tshad myed pa'i de bzhin nyid
237b7('bum): kyi dmyigs te/ chud myed pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ chang myed pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur// de la gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi dmyigs/ gzugs
237b8('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhi
238a1('bum): nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rnam par tha rad pa rnams myi dmyigs/ rnam par tha rad pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rnam par tha rad pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rnam par tha rad pa/
238a2('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi dmyigs/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyig
238a3('bum): te/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rnam par thar
238a4('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myi dmyigs/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid myi
238a5('bum): dmyigs te/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / ma tshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa
238a6('bum): dang / smond pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la mngon par shes pa rnams myi dmyigs/ mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyig
238a7('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lha dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la ting nge 'dzin rnams myi dmyigs/ ting nge 'drind kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ ting nge 'dri dang nyid kyang mye dam+bimra
238a8('bum): ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi de bzhin nyid la dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi dmyigs/ gzungs kyi sgo de bzhin nyid kyi dbyigs te/ gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang myi dbyis
238b1('bum): na/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myi dmyigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ de
238b2('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lha dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la myi 'jigs pa rnams myi dmyigs/ myi 'jigs pa'i de ba'i
238b3('bum): nyid myi dmyigs te/ myi 'jigs pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myi dmyigs/ so so yang dag
238b4('bum): par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ so so yang dag pa ra rig pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs ma/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/
238b5('bum): de la snying rje chen po myi dmyigs/ snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang myi dmyigs na snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur
238b6('bum): de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams myi dmyigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi dmyigs te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang phyi dmyigs na/ sangs rgyas kyi
238b7('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lnga dbyigs par ka lnga 'gyur// de la rgya nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs/ rgya nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid myi dbyigs te/ rgyu nang tu zhum
238b8('bum): pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rgyu nang du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
239a1('bum): 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/
239a2('bum): de la phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid la
239a3('bum): dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la dgra bcom pa nyid kyi dmyigs/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dbyigs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la
239a4('bum): dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la rang byang chub myi dmyigs rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rang byang chub de nyid kyang myi dmyigs ma/ rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid la
239a5('bum): dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi dmyigs/ ldum gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang mya
239a6('bum): dmyigs pa/ las kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi dri bzhin nyid lha dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi dmyigs/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhidi nyid kyi
239a7('bum): dmyigs te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang kyi'i rimyigs na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/
239a8('bum): bam po bcwa lnga pa'o// / sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de
239b1('bum): bzhidi nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi le'u 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ dge slong nyis brgya nye bar le nad pa myed par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo// dge slong ma lnga brgyan chos rnams la
239b2('bum): chos kyi myig rdul myed cing / dri ma dang bral ba skyes so// byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong dang / lha dang myi rnams kyis myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob bo// byang chub sems dpal yongs su
239b3('bum): nyam pa'i chos can drug cu ni nye bar le nad pa myed par zag pa las sems rnam par grol te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag gis ni/ sangs rgyas lnga brgya bsnyen
239b4('bum): bkur te/ thams cad du yang sbyin pa byin/ tshul khrims/ bsrungs/ bzod pa bsgoms/ brtson 'grus brtsams/ bsam gtan bsgrubs/ shes rab bsgoms kyang de dag
239b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzung zhing / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung bas/ sbyin pa byin te/ 'di la bdag gis sbyin par bya'o// 'di la sbyin par myi bya
239b6('bum): 'di ni tshul khrims so// bdag gis ni srung bar bya'o// 'di ni bzod pa'o// bdag gis ni bsgom par bya'o// 'di ni brtson 'grus so// bdag gis ni brtsam par bya'o// 'di ni bsam gtan do//
239b7('bum): bdag gis ni mnyam par gzhag par bya'o// 'di ni shes rab bo// bdag gis ni bsgom par bya'o// zhes tha dad par spyod pas de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bral zhing thabs mkha
239b8('bum): pas yongs su ma bzung bar sbyin pa gtong/ tshul khrims srung / bzod pa sgom/ brtson 'grus rtsom/ bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog/ shes rab goms par byed cing de dag
240a1('bum): 'du shes sna tshogs kyis spyod pas/ ba myi dad pa ma dbyigs pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod myed par ma zhugs so// de dag byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par
240a2('bum): ma zhugs pas/ rgyu rang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
240a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lam stong pa nyid dam/ mtshan ma myed pa 'am/ smon pa myed pa yod mod kyi/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bral zhing thabs mkhas
240a4('bum): pas yongs su ma bzung na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon tu byas nas/ nya thos sasu/ rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// gsol dpa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du stong
240a5('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma mchis pa dang / sprond pa ma mchi sa pa'i chos de dag nyid la sgom du 'dra yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu tu phyind pa dang bral zhing thabs mkhas pa dang bral/
240a6('bum): rnams ni yang dag pa'i mthal mngon tu bgyis shing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur la/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba dag ni/ song
240a7('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma mchis pa dang / smond pa ma mchis pa'i chos de dag nyid la sgrom du bas kyang thabs mkhas pa la brten cing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
240a8('bum): ba' 'chang rgya bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ma dwa ti'i bu 'di la kha cig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa pa'i sems dang bral bstong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /
240b1('bum): smond pa myed pa'i chos 'ba' shig sgom pa ni thabs mkhas pa ma thob pas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag tu 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
240b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral ba rnams ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i chos rnams la sgom zhing thabs mkhas pa thob pas/ byang chub seMs
240b3('bum): dpa' skyon myed par 'jug cing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na bya zhig la lus dpag tshad brgya pa 'am/
240b4('bum): dpag tshad nyis brgya pa 'am/ dpag tshad sum brgya pa 'am/ dpag tshad ba'i brgya pa 'am/ dpag tshad lnga brgya pa zhig yod la/ de sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ras nas/ 'dir 'ong bar 'dod
240b5('bum): 2/ bya de la 'dab ma myed pa zhig ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling ru ka nas so snyam nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris nas bdag nyid mchongs na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la ji snyam du ses
240b6('bum): kal te bye de las nas ma la bdag gis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i dris su gnas par bya'o snyam du sems na/ shar dwa ti'i bu de la jisnyas du sems/ bya des phyir sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris su gnas
240b7('bum): par nus sam/ gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te lam nas 'di snyam du ma la bdag gso ce nas kyang ma smas ma snad par 'dzam dum
240b8('bum): klang du 'dug par bya'o snyam ma/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la ji snyam du sems/ bya de 'dzam bu'i gling dum sbas pa sdad pa 'dug par 'gyur ro gsol dab/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
241a1('bum): de ni 'dzam bu'i gling du srung das spras pa 'am snang bar yang 'gyur/ 'gum pa'am/ kum la thug par sdug bsngal bar yang 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar lus
241a2('bum): che la 'dab ma mchis pa de ni de ltar 'gyur du ka dod myi 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed du
241a3('bum): sbyin pa gtong zhing / tshul khrims srung / bzod pa sgom// brtsor 'grus rtsom/ bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog cing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang
241a4('bum): rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/ de'i smon pa yang cha de'i sems bskye/ da pa yang che/ yongs su 'dzind pa yang tshad myed du za nad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bral zhing / thabs
241a5('bum): mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung na/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' des/ rnam pa thams cad la
241a6('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems dang myi ldan par/ spyir ba byin/ tshul khrims srungs/ bzod pa bsgoms/ brtson 'grus brtsams/ bsam gtan bsgrubs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' de shes rab kyi pha
241a7('bum): tu phyi rid pa dang thal 'ang / thabs mdzes pas yongs su su bzung ba'i rtsa re/ nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi ser ltung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byung chu ba sems dpa' 'das pa dang /
241a8('bum): ma 'ongs pa dang / dkar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzi nad dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa sems nam
241b1('bum): 'dzin la mtshan mar byed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi tshul khrims myi shes/ ting nge 'dzind myi shes/ shes rab myi shes/ rnam par grol ba myi shes/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa myi
241b2('bum): shes na/ de myi shes khong du ma chud pas stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i sgra thos nas/ de ni de dag la zhi bar mtshan mar 'dzind te/ des de dag la zhi bar mtshan mar gzung
241b3('bum): zhing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo'o// de ltar yongs su sngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ro// /
241b4('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol da du phyind pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang bral bas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
241b5('bum): tu yongs su sngo ba ni de ltar 'gyur du gdon myi za'o// ra dwa ta'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thog ma sems bskyed pa nas/ nye bar bzung ste/ rnam
241b6('bum): tha thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems dang sa bral bar sbyin pa gtong zhing / tshul khrims srung ba dang / bzod pas bsgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog pa ni/
241b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / babs mokhas pa dang sa bral ba ste/ 'das pa dang / sa byo du dang / daltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin
241b8('bum): dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa de la mtshan mar myi byed de/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la mtshan mar gyi 'dzin pa/ mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge
242a1('bum): 'dzin la mtshan mar myi 'dzidad / smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mtshan mar myi 'dzin dan/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ nyan thos dang / rang /
242a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par myi 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ thog ma sems bskyed pa nas nye bar gzung ste/ sbyin
242a3('bum): ba byin yang mtshan mar ma bzung / tshul khrims bsrungs kyang mtshan mar ma bzung / bzod pas bsgrubs kyang mtshan mar ma bzung / brtson 'grus brtsams kyang mtshan mar ma ba rung / bsam gtan la
242a4('bum): mnyam par gzhag kyang mtshan mar ma bzung / shes rab bsgo mas kyang mtshan mar ma bzung / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
242a5('bum): kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa mtshan mar ma bzung / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa
242a6('bum): dang / smond pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind rnams bsgoms kyang mtshan mar ma bzung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang / mtshan ma dang bral
242a7('bum): ba'i sems kyis/ tshul khrims srung ba dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis bzod pas sgrub pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral gA
242a8('bum): sems kyis/ bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog pa dang / mtshams dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ shes rab sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ rang stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtsham
242b1('bum): ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis phyi stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba 'i sems kyis/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa
242b2('bum): dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ chen po stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral/ ba'i sems kyis ron dam pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ 'dus byas/
242b3('bum): stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang
242b4('bum): bral ba'i sems kyis/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ dor de ba myed pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i
242b5('bum): sems kyis/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma/ dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// ma pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ rang gi
242b6('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ gyi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan pa dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang
242b7('bum): mtshams dang bral ba'i sems kyisango bo nyid stong pa nyid sgos pa dang / mtshan sa dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ dngos po myed pa ngos nyid stong ba nyid nom pa dang / macad ma dang ba'i sems kyis/
242b8('bum): ba nye bar gzhag pa rnams sdom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan pa dang bral ba la sems kyis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sgom pa
243a1('bum): dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ dbang po rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ stobs rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ byang chub
243a2('bum): kyi yan lag rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan sa dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ 'phags pa 'i bden pa rnams sgom
243a3('bum): ba dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ bsam gtan rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ tshad myed pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/
243a4('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ rnam par tha rad pa/ rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis
243a5('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ rnam pa ratha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang
243a6('bum): smond pa myed pa sgom pa dang / mtshan mA dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ mngon par shes pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan
243a7('bum): ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ gzungs kyi sgornams skom pa dang / mtshan pa dang bral ba'i sems kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgos bu dang / mtshan sa dang bral ba'i sems
243a8('bum): kyis kyi 'jigs pa rnams smom pa dang / mtshams dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ mos yang dag par rig pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshams dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ snying rje chen po sgom kha pa
243b1('bum): mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi ma 'dres pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i seMs
243b2('bum): kyis/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i gyis/ dgra bcom pa nyid sgom pa dang /
243b3('bum): mtshan ma dang bral sems kyis/ rang byang chub sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ rnam pa thams cad
243b4('bum): mkhyend pa nyid sgom pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sem/ sa dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
243b5('bum): gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba lhur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ nye b.ragazung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / thabs
243b6('bum): mkhas pa dang ma bral na/ de'i bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni the tsom ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de mi 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
243b7('bum): des sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ gang mngon par rdzogs par 'chang chub dang / gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ba dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
243b8('bum): bgyi ba'i gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa'am/ byig gam/ rna ba 'am/ sA 'am/ sre 'am/ lus sam/ yid dam// gzugs
244a1('bum): sarba/ sgra 'am/ dri 'am/ ro 'am/ reg gam/ chos sam// myig gi rnam par shes pa 'am/ rna ba'i rnam pa shes pa 'am/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'am
244a2('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'am// myig gi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lus kyi
244a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am// myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'o/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
244a4('bum): ba 'am/ sde'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'am/ sa'i khas
244a5('bum): sam/ chu'i khams sam/ mye'i khams sam/ rlung gi mas sam/ nam mkha'i khams sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams sam// ma rig pa 'am/ 'du byed dam/
244a6('bum): rnam par shes pa 'am/ mying dang gzugs sum/ skye mched drug gam/ reg pa 'am/ tshor ba 'am/ sred pa 'am/ lend pa 'am/ srid pa 'am/ skye ba 'am/ rga shi 'am/ sbyin pa'i
244a7('bum): rolab tu phyind pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyi nad pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyir pa 'am/
244a8('bum): shes rab kyis rosong tu phyin pa pa 'am// rang stong pa nyid dam/ kyi stong pa nyid nga ma slong sa nyid ma/ yong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen mo dong pa nyid dam/ dod dam sa rmongs nyid
244b1('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid de
244b2('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ phyi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
244b3('bum): pa nyid dam// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sa
244b4('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/ bsam gtan rnams so// tshad myed dpa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
244b5('bum): rnams sam/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams sam/ mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon
244b6('bum): pa myed pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzind rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so
244b7('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong
244b8('bum): ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub 'am/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dam/ chos gang
245a1('bum): yang dmyigs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang thabs mkhas
245a2('bum): pa dang bral ba de dag gi/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni the tshom mchis par rig par bgyi ba ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i
245a3('bum): theg pa tha rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ sbyin pa mi dang ci btang ba de thams cad mtshan mar bzung ste btang / de bzhin du tshul khrims gang dang gang bsrungs pa dang / bzod pas
245a4('bum): ci dang ci bsgrubs pa dang / brtson 'grus kang dang gang brtsa/ mas pa dang / bsam gtan gang dang kang la mnyam par ga/ zhag pa dang / shes rab gang bsgoms pa de dag thams
245a5('bum): cad mtshan par bzung ste/ bsgoms pas de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
245a6('bum): ni/ be tsom mchis par rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
245a7('bum): 'chang rgya bar 'tshal bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dang thabs mkhas pa dpe sa bral bar 'gyi'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang babs mkhas pa la gnas te/ phyi dmyigs
245a8('bum): ba'i tshul gyis mtsham ma myed pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ smin pa yongs su btang bar 'argya'o// tshul khrims bsru bar 'gyi'o// bzod pas bsgrub par bcom// brtson 'brum brtsas
245b1('bum): bar bgyi'o// bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag par bgyi'o// shes rab bsgom par bgyi'o// nang stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o// phyi stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid
245b2('bum): la spyad par bgyi'o// stong ba nyid stong pa nyid la spyad par 'gyi'o// chen po stong pa nyid la spyad par 'gyi'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la smad par 'byin
245b3('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa
245b4('bum): bgyi'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o// mya dmyigs pa stong pa
245b5('bum): nyid la spyad par bgyi'o// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la smra/ da par bgyi'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o// /
245b6('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhug pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyad par bgyi'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o// dbang po rnams la spyad par bgyi'o// stobs rdzas
245b7('bum): la spyad par bgyi'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la smad par bgyi ro/ 'phags pa'i lam yas lag brgyad pa la spyad par bgyi'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o// bsam gtan
245b8('bum): rnams la spyad par bgyi'o// tshad myed pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o// rnam par tha rad pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o//
246a1('bum): mab kyis gnas bya'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyad bdu ba gyi'o// rnam par thar dpa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshanas sbed pa dang / smon da pa myed pa la spyang par na rgya ma/ sar+b+ba
246a2('bum): bar shes pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o// ting nge 'dzind rnams la spyad par bgyi'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyad par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyad par bgyi'o// mya
246a3('bum): 'jigs pa rnams la spyad par 'gyi'o// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o// snying rje chen po la spyad par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o//
246a4('bum): rgyu dad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyad par bgyi'o// lan ka phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyad par bgyi'o// phyir myi'o// nga ba'i 'bras bu la spyad par bgyi'o// dgra bcom pa nyid
246a5('bum): la spyad par bgyi'o// rang byang chub la spyad par 'gyi'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid la spyad par bgyi'o// de nas/
246a6('bum): 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa ra spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
246a7('bum): chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'byed la chos de dag kyang sa mchis shing / rdzi dmyigs pas/ b+ha na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'byung bar dka'o// btso
246a8('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' su la pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag bla ra myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'byung bar dka'o// lha'i bu dag ngas kyang chos
246b1('bum): thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ don dam par na gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'am/ gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'am/ ka
246b2('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos gang yang ma dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu dag chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byord
246b3('bum): kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'byung bar dka'o zhes gsungs pa
246b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar gsungs pa'i don bdag ka sa 'tshal pa dang / bdag sems pa ltar na/ bcom ldan 'das bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
246b5('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar bgyi ba ni myi dre ka'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar kang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis/ ka
246b6('bum): klas kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgyab ma mchis/ gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya mchis te/ chos thams cad spyod pa la ni gang mngon par rdzogs par 'chang chub dang / ka
246b7('bum): gis mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ba dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar bgyi ba'i chos de lta bu ma mchis so// de ci'i srang du zhe ra/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar/ chos
246b8('bum): thams cad ni spong pa ste/ chos gang 'phel bar 'gyi ba'i srang du'am/ yongs su 'grib par bgyi ba'i skad du/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba 'am/ tshul khrims bsrung ba 'am/
247a1('bum): bzod pa bsgom pa 'am/ brtson 'grus brtsam pa 'am/ bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag pa 'am/ shes rab bsgos pa 'am/ nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ gyi stong pa/
247a2('bum): nyid bsgom pa 'am/ phyi rang stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ 'dus byas
247a3('bum): stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am/ dor ba myed pa stong pa
247a4('bum): nyid bsgom pa 'am/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ myi dmyigs pa stong
247a5('bum): pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom ba 'am/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am// dran pa
247a6('bum): nye bar kazhag pa rnams bsgos pa 'am/ yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom pa 'am/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/ dbang po rnams bsgom pa 'am/ stobs rnams bsgom pa 'am/
247a7('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden 'arnams bsgom pa 'am/ bsam gtan rnams bsgom pa 'am/ chad rtsed
247a8('bum): pa rnams bsgom pa 'am// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/ rnam par ba rad pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
247b1('bum): bsgom pa 'am/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa bsgom pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/ ting nge 'dzind rnams bsgom pa 'am
247b2('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa 'am// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgom pa 'am/ myi 'jigs pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/ byams pa/
247b3('bum): chen po bsgom pa 'am/ snying rje chen po bsgom pa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom pa 'am// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
247b4('bum): bsgom pa 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ rang byang chub bsgom pa 'am/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa 'am
247b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi don du bslab pa'i chos de dag kyang ma mchis pa ste/ kang mngon par rdzogs para'achang rgya ba 'am/ gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tsha
247b6('bum): rgyu ba 'am/ gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i chos de dag thams cad kyang spyod pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnas grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ tha
247b7('bum): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgyu bar sla'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di sar gzugs mi gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ro
247b8('bum): tshor ba tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis song ngo // 'du shes ni 'du shes kyi rang bzhi kyis so / 'du byed ni 'du byed kyi rang bzhid kyis spong ngo // rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa rigs pa'i rang bzhin gyi maco
248a1('bum): smi ka ri myig gi rang bzhin gyis stong po/ rna ba ming ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // snga ni sna'i rang bzhin gyis skyong ngo // lce ni l+le'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lus nri lus kyi rang bzhin gyis spyod/
248a2('bum): ngo// yid ni yid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sgra ni sgra'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // dri ni dri'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // ron ro'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
248a3('bum): reg ni reg gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // chos ni chos kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // myig gi rnam par shes pa ni myig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam
248a4('bum): par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong po/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis
248a5('bum): stong ngo // lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes/ pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // yid kyi rnam par shes pa ning / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // myig
248a6('bum): ke 'dus te reg pa ni mye ka gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa min ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni snga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang
248a7('bum): bzhin kyis spong ngo // sde'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis spong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid
248a8('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // byig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'i phyag gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // ma kha'i 'dus te reg pa las byung
248b1('bum): ba'i tshor ba ni na ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni snga'i 'dus te reg pa las byung tsho ba'i nga bzhin gyis stong ngo // lce'i 'dus
248b2('bum): te re ka pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhi
248b3('bum): gyis stong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // chu'i khas
248b4('bum): na chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo po// mye'i khams na mye/ de'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rlung gi khams ni rlung / gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // nam mkha' khams
248b5('bum): minam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin kyis stong ngo // rnam par sha sa pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // ma rig pa ni mo rig pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong
248b6('bum): dro/ 'du byed ni 'du byed kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin kyis stong ngo // sIng dang gzugs mi mying dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong 'o// skye mched drug ni
248b7('bum): skye mched drug gi rang bzhin gyis song ngo // rigra pa mi rigra pA'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rmed pa ni sred pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lend pa ni len
248b8('bum): rang ba'i kyis mang po/ med pa ni med pa'i rang bzhin kyis song ngo // skye ba skye ba'i rang bzhin kyis slong // ga gi shini gi'i rang lanyid kyil spong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyid pa'i phyir
249a1('bum): ba'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyind pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
249a2('bum): pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
249a3('bum): phyind pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin gyis spong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong
249a4('bum): pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi spyod / pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phye/ nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // stong pa nyid stong
249a5('bum): pa nyid de stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis / / don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don de stong pa nyid kyi rang
249a6('bum): bzhin gyis stong ngo // 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // mtha' las 'das/
249a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid nimatha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // 'og ma dang ba ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni thog sa dang ba ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis spong ngo // dor ba myed pa stong
249a8('bum): pa nyid ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang
249b1('bum): bzhin gyis stong ngo // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / dngos po
249b2('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed
249b3('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba'i rang bzhin
249b4('bum): gyis stong ngo // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi// da pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // dbang po rnams ni dbang po'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // stobs rnams ni stobs kyi rang ba
249b5('bum): kyis stong ngo // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub rgya yan lag gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni lam kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /
249b6('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // bsam gtan dzas ni bas katan gyi rab bzhin gyis stong ngo // tshad myed pa rnams ni tshad myed pa'i rang bzhin gyis
249b7('bum): stong ngo // gzugs byed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs byed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam par tha rad pa rnams ni rnam par tha dad pa'i rang
249b8('bum): bzhin gyis stong po/ mthar dkyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
250a1('bum): mchad pa myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa ni rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtsham ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i rang bzhin gyis spyong po/ mngon par shes pa rnams mi mngon
250a2('bum): bar shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis spong ngo // ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzind kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de ba'in gshegs pa'i stobs
250a3('bum): rnams ri bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // myi 'jigs pa rnams ni myi 'jigs pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa'i

250a8('bum): bzhin gyis song ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bram tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor danam grangs des na/ tha rtsed pa sa ngangs par rdzog sa pa'i

261a6('bum): ya dag pa rjed pa sa par rdzogs pa sa rna'ang napa 'khyod de ro//
261a7('bum): rang gis can nyid stong pa nyid las sung dag pa dkyid pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa mo ba sa bu dbyigs sas/ smras pa/ sed ldan papa byob ma 'o// rnam
261b1('bum): dmyigs pa stong pa nyid las gung na gang bla ra myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu dmyigs sam/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ 'on dngos po myed pa stong

261b3('bum): gud na gang thar myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu dmyigs sam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ 'o na dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
261b4('bum): las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu dmyigs sam/ smras pa/ che dang / ldan pa rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
261b5('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las kud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya ba chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu dmyigs sam/ spras pa
261b6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ 'on yang dag par spong ba rnams las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu dmyigs sam/ smras pa/ tshe dang
261b7('bum): ldan pa rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ 'on rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu dmyigs sam/ smras pa/ tshe dang
261b8('bum): ldan pa rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no// sbas pa/ 'on dbang po rnams las gud da kang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu dmyigs sas/ spras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
262a1('bum): rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ 'on stobs rnams las gud na gang bla ran myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu dmyigs sam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
262a2('bum): 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ 'od byang chub kyi sa nas ga rnams las gud da gang thar byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de sa du dmyigs sam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan par ba
262a3('bum): 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ lon 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las gud na gang tha ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu dmyigs sam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
262a4('bum): pa rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ 'on 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las kud na kang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu dmyigs

262a8('bum): byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu dmyigs sam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ 'on rnam par tha rad pa rnams las kud na gang bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byad
262b1('bum): chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu dmyigs sam/ spras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ 'o na mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na kang bla na myed pa yang

262b8('bum): 'jigs pa rnams las kung na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu dmyigs sam/ sbas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ lon so so
263a1('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu dmyigs sam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no// smras

265b8('bum): byang chub las ldog gam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyind pa'i
266a1('bum): de bzhin nyid ga yin pa de zan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gas/ shes rab kyi pha rlos tu phyind pa 'di bzhin nyid gang yin pa dwe bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs/

266a4('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa/ 'i byang chub las ldog gam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs par

266a8('bum): pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ thog ma dang ba ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
266b1('bum): gang yin pa de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog kam/ chos thams/

266b4('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog kam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
266b5('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzog sa pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan parab 'byor du de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa

266b7('bum): mAn byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sapa ldog gas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bdi nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog kas/ dbang po rnams kyi dri bzhin
266b8('bum): nyid gang yin pa de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ byang chub kyi yan
267a1('bum): lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de tha da myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de thA na sbed pa yang dag par
267a2('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
267a3('bum): de bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gas/ chad byed pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gas/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
267a4('bum): 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ rnam par thar/ dad pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na myed pa yang dag par
267a5('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ mthard kyis gnas pa na snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de tha na mye dpa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gas/ rnam
267a6('bum): par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kanga?/
267a7('bum): yin pa de tha ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gas/ ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yid pa de ma na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi
267a8('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gas// / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldon
267b1('bum): gam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de blar myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gas/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzog
267b2('bum): pa'i byang chub las ldog gas/ snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las sdom gas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na
267b3('bum): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog kam// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
267b4('bum): bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs dpa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pan
267b5('bum): byang chub las ldog kam/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de thar sred pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu ba las ldog gam/ rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
267b6('bum): pa de/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gas/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de/ bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gas
267b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ sbas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no//
268a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po bcu bdun pa'o// / smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems// gzu/
268a2('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzog mi byang chub las ldog sde chos de la bu sno pa tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las kud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i

268b1('bum): nyid las gud na bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du/

268b3('bum): byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ dri'i de bzhin nyid las gud na gang than myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ ro'i de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na myed pa

268b6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ byig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na gang tha na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ na ba'i rnam par
268b7('bum): shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gung na gang tha ra myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
268b8('bum): pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ khre'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las kud dgang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ lus kyi rnam par

269a4('bum): las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ snga'i 'dus te reg pa de'i de bzhin nyid las kud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs/ dpa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ lce'i 'dus
269a5('bum): te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na myed
269a6('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na kang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod
269a7('bum): dam/ sbas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan ba shu ra dwa ti li bu de ji snyam nu sems/ rtsig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las kud nag tha byed
269a8('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gung na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa ni

269b3('bum): ra myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
269b4('bum): las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ smras pa/ che dang / dan pa rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pasha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ sa'i khams kyi de bzhin
269b5('bum): nyid las kud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs

269b7('bum): khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ rnam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na myed pa ya
269b8('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid las kud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa
270a1('bum): chos de lta bu yod dam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid las

270a4('bum): bzhin nyid las gud na kang bla na myed pa yang dag par dgas pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na myed pa

270a6('bum): ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las krung na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ sred pa'i de bzhin nyid las grangan
270a7('bum): gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de la bu yod dam/ le rang ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud ma gang bla na myed pa yang dgu par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos
270a8('bum): de lta bu yod dam/ srid pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ skye ba'i de bzhin nyid las kud na gang bla na myed pa yang
270b1('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ rga shi'i de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ spras
270b2('bum): 5/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no// sbas pa/ che dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de snyam gyi sems/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid las gung na kang thun myed pa yang dag par rdzog
270b3('bum): pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid las kud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod de
270b4('bum): 'azod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud dag/ nga bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
270b5('bum): phyind pa'i dri bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod de bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid las grang
270b6('bum): na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid las kud na gang bla ra myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
270b7('bum): las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor du de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las kyang na
270b8('bum): gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de la bu yod dam/ phye stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las kung na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos
271a1('bum): de lta bu yod dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud ma gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
271a2('bum): las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chubalas ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
271a3('bum): pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las kung na gang bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ 'dus byas stong
271a4('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na
271a5('bum): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyi de las kud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
271a6('bum): chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ thog sa dang tha ma myed pa stong pa 'i kyi ba'i kyi ldan dgang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid
271a7('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
271a8('bum): pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ rang gi
271b1('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na myed
271b2('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na kar myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu
271b3('bum): yod dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
271b4('bum): las kud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub da las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ spras pa/ che dang na pa rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/
271b5('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ dran pa nye bar gzhag paHde bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla ra myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ ya
271b6('bum): dag par spong ba'i de bzhin nyid las ku na kang thar myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang
271b7('bum): dgra par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ dbang po'i de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ stobs
271b8('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
272a1('bum): pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog
272a2('bum): pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ bsam gtan gyi de bzhin
272a3('bum): nyid las gud na gang tha na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ tshad myed pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
272a4('bum): ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms/ par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang / dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu
272a5('bum): yod dam/ rnam par ba rad pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa 'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
272a6('bum): par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /
272a7('bum): smond pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid las kud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na byed pa yang dag
272a8('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ ting nge 'dzind kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam
272b1('bum): gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na
272b2('bum): skyed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ myi 'jigs pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu
272b3('bum): yod dam/ so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid las gud na gang
272b4('bum): tha na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'ichos de lta bu yod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzog

272b8('bum): ma yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid las gud mag pa bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i

275a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor du la bkul stsal

278b1('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i legs pa brjod par bya/ sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o//
278b2('bum): bdag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya/ gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i legs

278b5('bum): nang stong pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya/ gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ nang stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya/ sems can gzhan gang
278b6('bum): nang stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang phyi stong pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya/ gzhan yang phyi stong pa nyid la
278b7('bum): yang dag par bskul bar bya/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya/ sems can gzhan gang phyi stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'dug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dka' bar bya'o//
278b8('bum): bdag gis kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid mnyam par gzhag par bya/ gzhan yang phyi nang stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya/ sems can gzhan gang

279a3('bum): gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang chen po stong pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya// gzhan yang chen po stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ chen po stong

279a5('bum): kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya/ gzhan yang don dam pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ dor dam pa stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya/ sos

279a8('bum): dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya// gzhan yang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la yang dag par

279b4('bum): bya'o// bdag gis kyang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya/ gzhan yang thog dam dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar

279b7('bum): bskyed pa stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya/ sems can gzhan gang dor ba skyed pa spyong pa nyid la snyoms par 'dug pa de dag gi legs pa 'arjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o// bang /
279b8('bum): gos kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya// gzhan yang rang bzhi ni stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya// sas

280a7('bum): bas dga' bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya/ gzhan yang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya// dngos po myed pa stong pa
280a8('bum): nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya/ sems can gzhan gang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang ngo bo nyid stong

281a5('bum): lag bdun sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgya da pa bsgom par bya/ gzhan yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag

281b7('bum): 'dod ci 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o// bdug gis kyang sapar dkyis gangs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom par bya/ gzham sangs par da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dbu ma pas
281b8('bum): par bskul bar bya/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya/ sems can gzhan gang ma pa rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa dgu bsgom pa de dag ni
282a1('bum): legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa bsgom par bya/ gzhan yang rnam par/
282a2('bum): ba rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ rnam par ba dad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i legs

282b1('bum): yongs su rdzogs par bya/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi legs pa brjod par bya// sems can gzhan kang de bzhin/

283a1('bum): bar byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya/ gzhan yang sangs

283a7('bum): su shes par bya/ kund 'byung ba rab tu spang bar bya/ 'gog pa mngon tu bya/ lam sgom par bya/ gzhan yang sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya ba dang / kun 'byung ba rab tu spang ba dang / 'gog pa
283a8('bum): mngon tu bya ba dang / lam bsgom pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba rab tu spong ba dang / 'gog pa mngon tu byed pa dang / lam bsgom pa'i legs
283b1('bum): pa marjod par bya/ sems gzhan gang sdug bsngal yongs su shes par byed pa dang / kun 'thung ba rab tu spong bu dang / 'gog pa mngon du byed pa dang / las banom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod pa thun
283b2('bum): bas dga' bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang rgyu dang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir shes pa bskyed de/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon tu myi bya/ gzhan yang rgyu dang du zhugs pa'i 'bras chu shas

284a1('bum): bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir shes pa bskyed de/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon tu myi bya/ gzhan yang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu shes pa

284b1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bya'o// bdag gis kyang sems can rnams yongs su sbyind par bya/ gzhan yang sems can yongs su smyind par bya ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ ses
284b2('bum): can yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i legs pa brjod par bya/ sems cad gzhan gang sems can rnams yongs su sbyind par byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dka' bar bya'o//

284b6('bum): par bya/ sems cad gzhan gang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bskyed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
284b7('bum): ye shes bskyed par bya/ gzhan yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi legs pa brjod par bya/ sems
284b8('bum): can gzhan gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ye shes bskyed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa zas
285a1('bum): cad spang bar bya// gzhan yang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad
285a2('bum): spang ba'i legs pa brjod par bya// sems can gzhan gang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya ste/ de ltar byang chub seMs

294a4('bum): nyid las phyir log pa/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las phyir log/ pa/ dngos po myed de'i ngo bo nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid lasaphyir log pa// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las phyir
